trans-unit.source: You've arrived at the outpost the Jestmaster told you about. Equip the Funbringer 3000 and bombard the outpost with Fun until the more serious inhabitants realize this is better left for the Children of the Honkmother!
trans-unit.target: You've arrived at the outpost the Jestmaster told you about. Equip the Funbringer 3000 and bombard the outpost with Fun until the more serious inhabitants realize this is better left for the Children of the Honkmother!

trans-unit.source: People seem to be mightily annoyed by the Funbringer. Perhaps this will work!
trans-unit.target: People seem to be mightily annoyed by the Funbringer. Perhaps this will work!

trans-unit.source: Distant sounds of bike horns echo from somewhere in the outpost, followed by a joyful holler: “Praise the Honkmother!”
trans-unit.target: Distant sounds of bike horns echo from somewhere in the outpost, followed by a joyful holler: “Praise the Honkmother!”

trans-unit.source: One of the outpost dwellers yells at you. “Take that thing out of here or I'll call the security!”
trans-unit.target: One of the outpost dwellers yells at you. “Take that thing out of here or I'll call the security!”

trans-unit.source: An announcement comes over the PA. “To all security personnel: Shut that fucking clown machine down by any means necessary. Use of deadly force is authorized...no, encouraged.”
trans-unit.target: An announcement comes over the PA. “To all security personnel: Shut that fucking clown machine down by any means necessary. Use of deadly force is authorized...no, encouraged.”

trans-unit.source: Another announcement comes over the PA. “Okay, we give up. This ain't worth it. Have your goddamn outpost, just please shut that thing down.”
trans-unit.target: Another announcement comes over the PA. “Okay, we give up. This ain't worth it. Have your goddamn outpost, just please shut that thing down.”

trans-unit.source: “Oh, thank god. We thought we'd never be getting out of here!”
trans-unit.target: “Oh, thank god. We thought we'd never be getting out of here!”

trans-unit.source: An announcement comes over the PA. “To all security personnel: code red. We've got some fugitives on the run.”
trans-unit.target: An announcement comes over the PA. “To all security personnel: code red. We've got some fugitives on the run.”

trans-unit.source: “Hey. I presume you were sent here by Lt. Petran?”
trans-unit.target: “Hey. I presume you were sent here by Lt. Petran?”

trans-unit.source: “Yes, we were assigned to get you out of here.”
trans-unit.target: “Yes, we were assigned to get you out of here.”

trans-unit.source: “Yeah, I figured. Thanks. And I presume you've got a boat ready?”
trans-unit.target: “Yeah, I figured. Thanks. And I presume you've got a boat ready?”

trans-unit.source: “Yes, follow me!”
trans-unit.target: “Yes, follow me!”

trans-unit.source: “Actually, I've got a couple of bones to pick before we leave. Let's meet on board that boat of yours in five minutes.” The man darts off before you manage to say anything.
trans-unit.target: “Actually, I've got a couple of bones to pick before we leave. Let's meet on board that boat of yours in five minutes.” The man darts off before you manage to say anything.

trans-unit.source: “We're interested. Please continue.”’
trans-unit.target: “We're interested. Please continue.”’

trans-unit.source: “If you're willing to help us in our fight against the Coalition, I've got an offer for you… We've got a couple of operatives in the next outpost over, requesting some explosives for their mission. Get them there intact, and we'll be sure to make it worth your while.”
trans-unit.target: “If you're willing to help us in our fight against the Coalition, I've got an offer for you… We've got a couple of operatives in the next outpost over, requesting some explosives for their mission. Get them there intact, and we'll be sure to make it worth your while.”

trans-unit.source: “I've got an important job available. The Coalition's got a couple of undercover operatives investigating Separatist activity in the neighboring outpost. It's better I don't go into the details, but we need to get them some weapons and ammunition stat. Deliver them and you'd be doing a great favor for the Coalition, and there'd also be some marks in it for you, of course.”
trans-unit.target: “I've got an important job available. The Coalition's got a couple of undercover operatives investigating Separatist activity in the neighboring outpost. It's better I don't go into the details, but we need to get them some weapons and ammunition stat. Deliver them and you'd be doing a great favor for the Coalition, and there'd also be some marks in it for you, of course.”

trans-unit.source: “Hey! Would you happen to have some room on board for a couple of extra passengers? My friends are looking for transportation to the next outpost over, and they’re willing to pay.” The clown lowers their voice. “You might want to keep an eye on them. They've got some crawlers in the attic, if you get what I mean. And they've never been on a submarine, and I don't know how they'll handle it.”
trans-unit.target: “Hey! Would you happen to have some room on board for a couple of extra passengers? My friends are looking for transportation to the next outpost over, and they’re willing to pay.” The clown lowers their voice. “You might want to keep an eye on them. They've got some crawlers in the attic, if you get what I mean. And they've never been on a submarine, and I don't know how they'll handle it.”

trans-unit.source: “Psst! Looking for work? A couple of our acolytes are looking for transportation to the next outpost over. I have to warn you though; even though we've made it very clear they're not ready for it yet, I suspect they might be planning a communion of their own. So you should keep an eye on them and make sure they don't do anything stupid on board.”
trans-unit.target: “Psst! Looking for work? A couple of our acolytes are looking for transportation to the next outpost over. I have to warn you though; even though we've made it very clear they're not ready for it yet, I suspect they might be planning a communion of their own. So you should keep an eye on them and make sure they don't do anything stupid on board.”

trans-unit.source: The outpost manager seems to hesitate a bit. “This mission might be on the more challenging side, but judging by your reputation, you may be able to pull it off.”
trans-unit.target: The outpost manager seems to hesitate a bit. “This mission might be on the more challenging side, but judging by your reputation, you may be able to pull it off.”

trans-unit.source: “A couple of our operatives were recently captured by the Separatists, and according to our informants, they're currently locked away in an outpost nearby. If you can get them out of there safely, we'll be sure to make it worth your while. I'll mark the location on your map.”
trans-unit.target: “A couple of our operatives were recently captured by the Separatists, and according to our informants, they're currently locked away in an outpost nearby. If you can get them out of there safely, we'll be sure to make it worth your while. I'll mark the location on your map.”

trans-unit.source: The outpost manager seems to hesitate a bit. “This mission might be on the more challenging side, but judging by your reputation, you may be able to pull it off.”
trans-unit.target: The outpost manager seems to hesitate a bit. “This mission might be on the more challenging side, but judging by your reputation, you may be able to pull it off.”

trans-unit.source: “A couple of our operatives were recently captured by the Coalition, and according to our informants, they're currently locked away in an outpost nearby. If you can get them out of there safely, we'll be sure to make it worth your while. I'll mark the location on your map.”
trans-unit.target: “A couple of our operatives were recently captured by the Coalition, and according to our informants, they're currently locked away in an outpost nearby. If you can get them out of there safely, we'll be sure to make it worth your while. I'll mark the location on your map.”

trans-unit.source: The outpost manager pulls out a document from his breast pocket. “This is one of those extra-sensitive missions, if you know what I mean. A commission from Lt. Petran. In fact, she hoped to assign this specifically to your crew.”
trans-unit.target: The outpost manager pulls out a document from his breast pocket. “This is one of those extra-sensitive missions, if you know what I mean. A commission from Lt. Petran. In fact, she hoped to assign this specifically to your crew.”

trans-unit.source: “The Coalition managed to capture one of our operatives recently. A very high-profile one, although luckily it seems they're not aware of his identity—otherwise he'd surely have been executed already.”
trans-unit.target: “The Coalition managed to capture one of our operatives recently. A very high-profile one, although luckily it seems they're not aware of his identity—otherwise he'd surely have been executed already.”

trans-unit.source: “Who is it?”
trans-unit.target: “Who is it?”

trans-unit.source: “Perhaps it's better we leave him unnamed, but let's say it's someone who's left quite a trail of smoldering Coalition outposts and vessels behind him. In any case, he is currently being held captive in a nearby outpost. Get him out safely, and there'll be a sizeable reward waiting for you.”
trans-unit.target: “Perhaps it's better we leave him unnamed, but let's say it's someone who's left quite a trail of smoldering Coalition outposts and vessels behind him. In any case, he is currently being held captive in a nearby outpost. Get him out safely, and there'll be a sizeable reward waiting for you.”

trans-unit.source: The outpost manager pulls out a document from his breast pocket, and looks at you with a contemplative expression. “Hmm… This particular mission was commissioned by Victoria Petran herself, and it's quite sensitive, but I suppose you've proven you're someone we can trust.”
trans-unit.target: The outpost manager pulls out a document from his breast pocket, and looks at you with a contemplative expression. “Hmm… This particular mission was commissioned by Victoria Petran herself, and it's quite sensitive, but I suppose you've proven you're someone we can trust.”

trans-unit.source: “You have heard of the Tormsdale incident, haven’t you?”
trans-unit.target: “You have heard of the Tormsdale incident, haven’t you?”

trans-unit.source: “That rings a bell, but please do elaborate.”
trans-unit.target: “That rings a bell, but please do elaborate.”

trans-unit.source: “Okay, I guess I’ll start from the beginning. Back when the Coalition was starting to gain a foothold on Europa, Tormsdale was by far the largest independent colony, and the Jovian People’s Movement obviously had strong support there. I suppose it was in a sense considered the headquarters of the independent colonies and the Movement. At that time, Europa was still somewhat democratic, and the general elections were coming up.”
trans-unit.target: “Okay, I guess I’ll start from the beginning. Back when the Coalition was starting to gain a foothold on Europa, Tormsdale was by far the largest independent colony, and the Jovian People’s Movement obviously had strong support there. I suppose it was in a sense considered the headquarters of the independent colonies and the Movement. At that time, Europa was still somewhat democratic, and the general elections were coming up.”

trans-unit.source: “Mm-hmm.”
trans-unit.target: “Mm-hmm.”

trans-unit.source: “Just a few weeks before the elections, there was a nuclear disaster in Tormsdale. Over a hundred people dead. And conveniently for the Coalition, almost all of them happened to be supporters of the Jovian People’s Movement. That was enough to tip the scales in their favor, and let them become the de jure government of Europa.”
trans-unit.target: “Just a few weeks before the elections, there was a nuclear disaster in Tormsdale. Over a hundred people dead. And conveniently for the Coalition, almost all of them happened to be supporters of the Jovian People’s Movement. That was enough to tip the scales in their favor, and let them become the de jure government of Europa.”

trans-unit.source: “That sounds a little too convenient to be a coincidence.”
trans-unit.target: “That sounds a little too convenient to be a coincidence.”

trans-unit.source: “Indeed. It was officially deemed an accident, but I find that very hard to believe. From there, things went south fast—the Movement was declared a terrorist organization, our founder Harlow Petran assassinated, most of the independent outposts taken over…”
trans-unit.target: “Indeed. It was officially deemed an accident, but I find that very hard to believe. From there, things went south fast—the Movement was declared a terrorist organization, our founder Harlow Petran assassinated, most of the independent outposts taken over…”

trans-unit.source: “Right. How does this tie in with the mission?”
trans-unit.target: “Right. How does this tie in with the mission?”

trans-unit.source: “We have reason to believe the Coalition still possesses some classified reports of what actually happened at Tormsdale. Our informants have strong evidence that copies of them are kept in a nearby outpost. If we got our hands on them, maybe we could finally prove this isn’t just a conspiracy theory, and get others to understand how dirty the Coalition has been playing ever since its early years.”
trans-unit.target: “We have reason to believe the Coalition still possesses some classified reports of what actually happened at Tormsdale. Our informants have strong evidence that copies of them are kept in a nearby outpost. If we got our hands on them, maybe we could finally prove this isn’t just a conspiracy theory, and get others to understand how dirty the Coalition has been playing ever since its early years.”

trans-unit.source: “We’d be glad to help.”
trans-unit.target: “We’d be glad to help.”

trans-unit.source: “Great. I’ll mark the outpost on your map. According to our intel, the documents are stored in a secure cabinet in the outpost manager’s office. Getting them out might be tricky—perhaps you could try to coerce the outpost manager or steal their ID card. Either way, please try to be discreet.”
trans-unit.target: “Great. I’ll mark the outpost on your map. According to our intel, the documents are stored in a secure cabinet in the outpost manager’s office. Getting them out might be tricky—perhaps you could try to coerce the outpost manager or steal their ID card. Either way, please try to be discreet.”

trans-unit.source: “Ah, I see. So, what’s the mission?”
trans-unit.target: “Ah, I see. So, what’s the mission?”

trans-unit.source: “Wait, what? You've been working with us this long, and you’ve never heard of her? She’s the First Lieutenant of the Jovian Separatists. Essentially our leader, if one can consider a group as loosely organized as us having a leader.”
trans-unit.target: “Wait, what? You've been working with us this long, and you’ve never heard of her? She’s the First Lieutenant of the Jovian Separatists. Essentially our leader, if one can consider a group as loosely organized as us having a leader.”

trans-unit.source: “Who's that?”
trans-unit.target: “Who's that?”

trans-unit.source: Take the money and promise to keep your mouth shut.
trans-unit.target: Take the money and promise to keep your mouth shut.

trans-unit.source: “I don't want your filthy money. Goodbye.”
trans-unit.target: “I don't want your filthy money. Goodbye.”

trans-unit.source: Someone wearing a peculiar-looking clown costume approaches you and pulls you aside. “I have not seen you here before—may I ask what brings you here? Are you jolly people, if you catch my drift?”
trans-unit.target: Someone wearing a peculiar-looking clown costume approaches you and pulls you aside. “I have not seen you here before—may I ask what brings you here? Are you jolly people, if you catch my drift?”

trans-unit.source: “We're just passing through. What do you mean by jolly people?”
trans-unit.target: “We're just passing through. What do you mean by jolly people?”

trans-unit.source: “People who heed the call of the bike horn: jokers, jesters and fools! Me and my un-disciples have found ourselves a nice and safe corner of the world here, and we hope we can keep it that way.”
trans-unit.target: “People who heed the call of the bike horn: jokers, jesters and fools! Me and my un-disciples have found ourselves a nice and safe corner of the world here, and we hope we can keep it that way.”

trans-unit.source: “Un-disciples? Is that to say you're some kind of leader?”
trans-unit.target: “Un-disciples? Is that to say you're some kind of leader?”

trans-unit.source: “No, no, I am no leader! I'm a Jestmaster—one might call me a teacher, but I'd rather say I guide people to the path of the bike horn.”
trans-unit.target: “No, no, I am no leader! I'm a Jestmaster—one might call me a teacher, but I'd rather say I guide people to the path of the bike horn.”

trans-unit.source: “Could you teach us about the path of the bike horn?”
trans-unit.target: “Could you teach us about the path of the bike horn?”

trans-unit.source: “If it was up to me, we'd round up all you useless ‘jolly people’ and send you to a work camp, if you catch my drift.”
trans-unit.target: “If it was up to me, we'd round up all you useless ‘jolly people’ and send you to a work camp, if you catch my drift.”

trans-unit.source: “That makes me a sad clown. But I don't judge: You're not the only one blinded by their lies. But if you ever change your mind and feel like opening your eyes, the Jestmaster might be willing to show you the path!”
trans-unit.target: “That makes me a sad clown. But I don't judge: You're not the only one blinded by their lies. But if you ever change your mind and feel like opening your eyes, the Jestmaster might be willing to show you the path!”

trans-unit.source: “I have no interest in this nonsense. Goodbye.”
trans-unit.target: “I have no interest in this nonsense. Goodbye.”

trans-unit.source: “Could you tell me more about 'the path,' whatever that means?”
trans-unit.target: “Could you tell me more about 'the path,' whatever that means?”

trans-unit.source: “Hmm, I can't help feeling a little suspicious of your intentions after that work camp talk! Although, were you to put on a more appropriate costume, I might gain a little more trust in your sincerity…”
trans-unit.target: “Hmm, I can't help feeling a little suspicious of your intentions after that work camp talk! Although, were you to put on a more appropriate costume, I might gain a little more trust in your sincerity…”

trans-unit.source: “No clown costume, no talk!”
trans-unit.target: “No clown costume, no talk!”

trans-unit.source: “Fine, I'll get back to you in a bit.”
trans-unit.target: “Fine, I'll get back to you in a bit.”

trans-unit.source: “You don't need to worry about us. May the Honkmother bless you and your outpost!”
trans-unit.target: “You don't need to worry about us. May the Honkmother bless you and your outpost!”

trans-unit.source: “Praised be the Honkmother! I was worried you're one of the serious folk who don't like me guiding people to the path of the bike horn.”
trans-unit.target: “Praised be the Honkmother! I was worried you're one of the serious folk who don't like me guiding people to the path of the bike horn.”

trans-unit.source: “Could you teach us about the path of the bike horn?”
trans-unit.target: “Could you teach us about the path of the bike horn?”

trans-unit.source: “That's the spirit! I don't like to call myself a teacher, and the reason is that I have nothing to teach you—that is on you. But what I can do is point you in the right direction, and perhaps you'll come to see the truth for yourself some day. To this end, I'd like to give you and your crew a little task that serves as your first step toward the Honkmother's embrace.”
trans-unit.target: “That's the spirit! I don't like to call myself a teacher, and the reason is that I have nothing to teach you—that is on you. But what I can do is point you in the right direction, and perhaps you'll come to see the truth for yourself some day. To this end, I'd like to give you and your crew a little task that serves as your first step toward the Honkmother's embrace.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm listening.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm listening.”

trans-unit.source: “You see this mask I'm wearing? There aren't many like it left on this moon, but if you put your heart into it, I'm sure you'll eventually find one during your travels. When you do, bring it to me or one of the other Jestmasters, and we'll see where that takes us! Oh, and please have this, some light reading for your travels! Ta-ta!”
trans-unit.target: “You see this mask I'm wearing? There aren't many like it left on this moon, but if you put your heart into it, I'm sure you'll eventually find one during your travels. When you do, bring it to me or one of the other Jestmasters, and we'll see where that takes us! Oh, and please have this, some light reading for your travels! Ta-ta!”

trans-unit.source: “Blessed be the Honkmother, it's you again! How's it going?”
trans-unit.target: “Blessed be the Honkmother, it's you again! How's it going?”

trans-unit.source: “I've retrieved the mask as you asked.”
trans-unit.target: “I've retrieved the mask as you asked.”

trans-unit.source: “I can see that! Congratulations! You can keep it—as you can see, I already have one. Or throw it away if you feel like it. It's just a mask, and a pretty ugly one, too, if you ask me.”
trans-unit.target: “I can see that! Congratulations! You can keep it—as you can see, I already have one. Or throw it away if you feel like it. It's just a mask, and a pretty ugly one, too, if you ask me.”

trans-unit.source: “Is this an invisible version of the mask, perhaps? I would actually like to see it.”
trans-unit.target: “Is this an invisible version of the mask, perhaps? I would actually like to see it.”

trans-unit.source: “Why did you want me to get it then?”
trans-unit.target: “Why did you want me to get it then?”

trans-unit.source: “The task itself was menial, wasn't it, like an unimaginative fetch quest in a children's role-playing game? But did you have fun while looking for it? I'm sure you ran into all sorts of trouble along the way, and I'm sure it was quite an adventure, something you even enjoyed at times. I bet you wouldn't have become a submariner if you didn't! So, perhaps I should ask you instead why you wanted to get it—or for that matter, why you want to keep cruising around Europa doing all sorts of tasks for people.”
trans-unit.target: “The task itself was menial, wasn't it, like an unimaginative fetch quest in a children's role-playing game? But did you have fun while looking for it? I'm sure you ran into all sorts of trouble along the way, and I'm sure it was quite an adventure, something you even enjoyed at times. I bet you wouldn't have become a submariner if you didn't! So, perhaps I should ask you instead why you wanted to get it—or for that matter, why you want to keep cruising around Europa doing all sorts of tasks for people.”

trans-unit.source: “I suppose I do enjoy the adventure, but what does this have to do with the path of the bike horn?”
trans-unit.target: “I suppose I do enjoy the adventure, but what does this have to do with the path of the bike horn?”

trans-unit.source: “Fun and games, fun and games! I chose a quest in a game as the analogy for a reason: When you go a bit further than that, all social institutions are games. And if you really get to the bottom of things, the whole world is a system of games: There's the people game, the crawler game, the game of bilging the hatches, stowing the afts and all those submariner things you do…”
trans-unit.target: “Fun and games, fun and games! I chose a quest in a game as the analogy for a reason: When you go a bit further than that, all social institutions are games. And if you really get to the bottom of things, the whole world is a system of games: There's the people game, the crawler game, the game of bilging the hatches, stowing the afts and all those submariner things you do…”

trans-unit.source: “Okay…?”
trans-unit.target: “Okay…?”

trans-unit.source: “But be careful of the word 'game'! It doesn't mean this is all meaningless. It's like we're playing a song: It's not that serious, but at the same time it can be very sincere. It can take all sorts of beautiful forms in all their complexity, for no reason at all beyond just doing them. Like this!” The Jestmaster honks his bike horn in your face.
trans-unit.target: “But be careful of the word 'game'! It doesn't mean this is all meaningless. It's like we're playing a song: It's not that serious, but at the same time it can be very sincere. It can take all sorts of beautiful forms in all their complexity, for no reason at all beyond just doing them. Like this!” The Jestmaster honks his bike horn in your face.

trans-unit.source: “I think I get what you mean. So, what's next?”
trans-unit.target: “I think I get what you mean. So, what's next?”

trans-unit.source: “Ooh boy, this one is going to be something! First of all, I want you to get yourself a toy hammer. You know, one of those silly plastic toys that go 'honk' when you smack someone with it.”
trans-unit.target: “Ooh boy, this one is going to be something! First of all, I want you to get yourself a toy hammer. You know, one of those silly plastic toys that go 'honk' when you smack someone with it.”

trans-unit.source: “And then…?”
trans-unit.target: “And then…?”

trans-unit.source: “Then comes the fun part: I want you to dive down into the abyss and meet one of those big fellas that live down there. A Latcher would do, but if you can find yourself a Charybdis or an Endworm, that'd be at least thrice the fun. Then, I want you to bop it with the hammer, and I want you to bop it good!”
trans-unit.target: “Then comes the fun part: I want you to dive down into the abyss and meet one of those big fellas that live down there. A Latcher would do, but if you can find yourself a Charybdis or an Endworm, that'd be at least thrice the fun. Then, I want you to bop it with the hammer, and I want you to bop it good!”

trans-unit.source: “That doesn't sound smart, but I trust there's some kind of a point to this.”
trans-unit.target: “That doesn't sound smart, but I trust there's some kind of a point to this.”

trans-unit.source: “That's the spirit! It's not smart in the slightest, but sometimes you're better off ignoring that sensical part of your noggin and just enjoying the ride on the rollercoaster the Grandest of Jesters has laid out for you. Anyhow, let me or one of my colleagues know when the deed is done. And take this along, some more reading for your travels! Good luck! I wish you an exciting and hopefully not-too-lethal ride!”
trans-unit.target: “That's the spirit! It's not smart in the slightest, but sometimes you're better off ignoring that sensical part of your noggin and just enjoying the ride on the rollercoaster the Grandest of Jesters has laid out for you. Anyhow, let me or one of my colleagues know when the deed is done. And take this along, some more reading for your travels! Good luck! I wish you an exciting and hopefully not-too-lethal ride!”

trans-unit.source: “What the hell? Are you trying to get me killed?”
trans-unit.target: “What the hell? Are you trying to get me killed?”

trans-unit.source: “I presume you don't see the silliness, nor the profoundness of that question yet, which is precisely why you need to do it if you wish to walk further down this path. There's nothing more I can tell you at this point, but let me or one of my colleagues know when the deed is done! And take this along, some more reading for your travels! Good luck, and remember to have fun!”
trans-unit.target: “I presume you don't see the silliness, nor the profoundness of that question yet, which is precisely why you need to do it if you wish to walk further down this path. There's nothing more I can tell you at this point, but let me or one of my colleagues know when the deed is done! And take this along, some more reading for your travels! Good luck, and remember to have fun!”

trans-unit.source: “This pseudophilosophical crap is making my brain hurt. Could you just tell me what the Honkmother is about?”
trans-unit.target: “This pseudophilosophical crap is making my brain hurt. Could you just tell me what the Honkmother is about?”

trans-unit.source: “I see you are very capable of not taking certain things seriously! If only you could direct that lack of giving a crawler's ass into something more fruitful… And yes, I can tell you the Honkmother is three pounds of custard pie, but that doesn't mean anything to you, does it? I didn't think so. Thus, you need more training—let's try another task!”
trans-unit.target: “I see you are very capable of not taking certain things seriously! If only you could direct that lack of giving a crawler's ass into something more fruitful… And yes, I can tell you the Honkmother is three pounds of custard pie, but that doesn't mean anything to you, does it? I didn't think so. Thus, you need more training—let's try another task!”

trans-unit.source: “Sure.”
trans-unit.target: “Sure.”

trans-unit.source: “Still haven't found the Mother's Countenance. Any tips?”
trans-unit.target: “Still haven't found the Mother's Countenance. Any tips?”

trans-unit.source: “These masks have been out of fashion for a long time, but perhaps if you found a wreck old enough, you might get lucky. And, of course, this is the traditional garment of the Jestmasters, so with a bit of outside-the-box thinking you might find another path forwards. Wink wink!”
trans-unit.target: “These masks have been out of fashion for a long time, but perhaps if you found a wreck old enough, you might get lucky. And, of course, this is the traditional garment of the Jestmasters, so with a bit of outside-the-box thinking you might find another path forwards. Wink wink!”

trans-unit.source: “Did you just say 'wink wink'?”
trans-unit.target: “Did you just say 'wink wink'?”

trans-unit.source: “Hey, I could use your opinion on something. Hypothetically, if one was building a Honkmotherian exosuit, would it be too on-the-nose to call it the 'HONK Mech'?”
trans-unit.target: “Hey, I could use your opinion on something. Hypothetically, if one was building a Honkmotherian exosuit, would it be too on-the-nose to call it the 'HONK Mech'?”

trans-unit.source: “Actually, never mind, it's nothing important! Let's get to business instead: A little bird told me you've been on a quest of sorts. How did the meeting with the abyss monster go?”
trans-unit.target: “Actually, never mind, it's nothing important! Let's get to business instead: A little bird told me you've been on a quest of sorts. How did the meeting with the abyss monster go?”

trans-unit.source: “Uhh, why're you asking?”
trans-unit.target: “Uhh, why're you asking?”

trans-unit.source: “How the hell do you think it went? I barely made it out alive.”
trans-unit.target: “How the hell do you think it went? I barely made it out alive.”

trans-unit.source: “I was sure you would, but I take it that you weren't quite as confident? It seems you still have some ways to go before you get to truly taste the custard pie. I want you to think about it. What is it you feared would happen—and what are you still afraid of? Had you gotten swallowed by that abyss thing, do you really think that would've silenced your bike horn for good, been the end of your story? Who is this 'you' you're afraid of losing?”
trans-unit.target: “I was sure you would, but I take it that you weren't quite as confident? It seems you still have some ways to go before you get to truly taste the custard pie. I want you to think about it. What is it you feared would happen—and what are you still afraid of? Had you gotten swallowed by that abyss thing, do you really think that would've silenced your bike horn for good, been the end of your story? Who is this 'you' you're afraid of losing?”

trans-unit.source: “Had I not escaped its jaws, it most definitely would've been the end of my story.”
trans-unit.target: “Had I not escaped its jaws, it most definitely would've been the end of my story.”

trans-unit.source: “Would it, really? That's a matter of perspective; if you insist that this role you're playing right now, these eyes through which the universe or whatever you wish to call it is looking at itself, is the whole extent of the story, then sure, that would've been a morbidly amusing end to 'your' story.”
trans-unit.target: “Would it, really? That's a matter of perspective; if you insist that this role you're playing right now, these eyes through which the universe or whatever you wish to call it is looking at itself, is the whole extent of the story, then sure, that would've been a morbidly amusing end to 'your' story.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm not sure what you mean.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm not sure what you mean.”

trans-unit.source: “I have no idea what you're trying to say.”
trans-unit.target: “I have no idea what you're trying to say.”

trans-unit.source: “I found it amusing, but the monster didn't seem to get the joke.”
trans-unit.target: “I found it amusing, but the monster didn't seem to get the joke.”

trans-unit.source: “Haha! The honk of your horn is getting more vibrant by the day. But do tell me, did this close encounter with death, or perhaps even a brief dip into death, make anything new rustle inside that noggin of yours?”
trans-unit.target: “Haha! The honk of your horn is getting more vibrant by the day. But do tell me, did this close encounter with death, or perhaps even a brief dip into death, make anything new rustle inside that noggin of yours?”

trans-unit.source: “I'm not sure what you mean.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm not sure what you mean.”

trans-unit.source: “We're getting into the territory where words fall short, but I'll give it a try. When we're inside the circus tent watching the performance, we don't think or talk about the world outside—we just immerse ourselves in the show. And that's good! Just enjoy the show without distracting yourself with the fact that at the end of the night, you'll be stepping out of the tent.”
trans-unit.target: “We're getting into the territory where words fall short, but I'll give it a try. When we're inside the circus tent watching the performance, we don't think or talk about the world outside—we just immerse ourselves in the show. And that's good! Just enjoy the show without distracting yourself with the fact that at the end of the night, you'll be stepping out of the tent.”

trans-unit.source: “Is this an allegory for afterlife?”
trans-unit.target: “Is this an allegory for afterlife?”

trans-unit.source: “Not any more than it is an allegory for 'beforebirth', whatever that means. Let me put it this way: think about what your original face looked like before you were born. Or, before you put on this mask. And after you've stepped out of the tent, are you completely sure that you won't be coming back some other day? You did enter the tent once, or perhaps even several times, so who's to say it can never happen again?”
trans-unit.target: “Not any more than it is an allegory for 'beforebirth', whatever that means. Let me put it this way: think about what your original face looked like before you were born. Or, before you put on this mask. And after you've stepped out of the tent, are you completely sure that you won't be coming back some other day? You did enter the tent once, or perhaps even several times, so who's to say it can never happen again?”

trans-unit.source: “You're talking about some kind of reincarnation now?”
trans-unit.target: “You're talking about some kind of reincarnation now?”

trans-unit.source: “As I said, this is something where the words of this world fall short. I can't spell it out in any more detail, but the bottom line is that death is a jest. Who is this 'you' you're afraid of losing, and can you really lose it? That could be a nice homework for you to ponder on until we meet again! Ta-ta!”
trans-unit.target: “As I said, this is something where the words of this world fall short. I can't spell it out in any more detail, but the bottom line is that death is a jest. Who is this 'you' you're afraid of losing, and can you really lose it? That could be a nice homework for you to ponder on until we meet again! Ta-ta!”

trans-unit.source: “I know what you're talking about, but let's keep the masks on and stick to our roles for now!”
trans-unit.target: “I know what you're talking about, but let's keep the masks on and stick to our roles for now!”

trans-unit.source: “By the Honkmother! I suppose you have indeed taken a peek or two outside the tent already. Or perhaps we should say, you're taking a peek into the tent right now? At any rate, I'm impressed at your progress. I think I'm going to need some time to figure out what our next step should be, so let's wrap this up for now. Until we meet again!”
trans-unit.target: “By the Honkmother! I suppose you have indeed taken a peek or two outside the tent already. Or perhaps we should say, you're taking a peek into the tent right now? At any rate, I'm impressed at your progress. I think I'm going to need some time to figure out what our next step should be, so let's wrap this up for now. Until we meet again!”

trans-unit.source: “I know what you're talking about. There is nothing after my death, but it's no more scary than the nothingness before my birth.”
trans-unit.target: “I know what you're talking about. There is nothing after my death, but it's no more scary than the nothingness before my birth.”

trans-unit.source: “I suppose that's one way of looking at it, but I'm afraid that's a huge banana peel you've just stepped on! You've completely misunderstood what I've been trying to get across. Let me put it this way: Think about what your original face looked like before you were born. Or, before you put on this mask. You know what, that could be a nice homework for you to ponder on until we meet again! Ta-ta!”
trans-unit.target: “I suppose that's one way of looking at it, but I'm afraid that's a huge banana peel you've just stepped on! You've completely misunderstood what I've been trying to get across. Let me put it this way: Think about what your original face looked like before you were born. Or, before you put on this mask. You know what, that could be a nice homework for you to ponder on until we meet again! Ta-ta!”

trans-unit.source: “I’m happy to run into you once again! In fact, the timing couldn’t have been better. We’ve been looking for a volunteer for a mission of sorts.”
trans-unit.target: “I’m happy to run into you once again! In fact, the timing couldn’t have been better. We’ve been looking for a volunteer for a mission of sorts.”

trans-unit.source: “We’re interested.”
trans-unit.target: “We’re interested.”

trans-unit.source: “After seeing how you fared with that abyss beast, I think you’ve proven yourself as someone with enough guts, or perhaps a healthy amount of carelessness, to pull this thing off. You remember that Honkmotherian exosuit I mentioned a while back?”
trans-unit.target: “After seeing how you fared with that abyss beast, I think you’ve proven yourself as someone with enough guts, or perhaps a healthy amount of carelessness, to pull this thing off. You remember that Honkmotherian exosuit I mentioned a while back?”

trans-unit.source: “I do. What about it?”
trans-unit.target: “I do. What about it?”

trans-unit.source: “We’ll get to that in a bit! You see, there happens to be an outpost nearby that used to be a safe haven of sorts for those who heed the call of the bike horn. An independent outpost where we could live a peaceful and quiet life, figuratively speaking. That hasn’t been the case in a long time though, nor is it anywhere on Europa nowadays, as I’m sure you know. Not a week goes by without news of a jester being beaten up or found dead in a ballast or what have you.”
trans-unit.target: “We’ll get to that in a bit! You see, there happens to be an outpost nearby that used to be a safe haven of sorts for those who heed the call of the bike horn. An independent outpost where we could live a peaceful and quiet life, figuratively speaking. That hasn’t been the case in a long time though, nor is it anywhere on Europa nowadays, as I’m sure you know. Not a week goes by without news of a jester being beaten up or found dead in a ballast or what have you.”

trans-unit.source: “I know. So, what is it you’re planning?”
trans-unit.target: “I know. So, what is it you’re planning?”

trans-unit.source: “We’re going to make ourselves a safe haven again! Now, we’re at a stalemate, with the outpost having seemingly become the property of the serious folks for good, our jolly people unable to do anything about it despite our best efforts. As if there was some rule that once you take an outpost, the owner is set in stone. So we’re going to have to bend the rules of the game a little! That’s where that exosuit comes in.”
trans-unit.target: “We’re going to make ourselves a safe haven again! Now, we’re at a stalemate, with the outpost having seemingly become the property of the serious folks for good, our jolly people unable to do anything about it despite our best efforts. As if there was some rule that once you take an outpost, the owner is set in stone. So we’re going to have to bend the rules of the game a little! That’s where that exosuit comes in.”

trans-unit.source: “You’ve actually built one?”
trans-unit.target: “You’ve actually built one?”

trans-unit.source: “Yes, we have! We don’t want to play as dirty as they do, but I believe we can do this without resorting to violence. We’re going to give that outpost such a bombardment of Fun, nuclear-powered bike horns blaring and banana peel cannons turning the place into an obstacle course, day and night for however long as it takes, until they have no choice but to give up and find themselves a more ‘serious’ place to stay.”
trans-unit.target: “Yes, we have! We don’t want to play as dirty as they do, but I believe we can do this without resorting to violence. We’re going to give that outpost such a bombardment of Fun, nuclear-powered bike horns blaring and banana peel cannons turning the place into an obstacle course, day and night for however long as it takes, until they have no choice but to give up and find themselves a more ‘serious’ place to stay.”

trans-unit.source: “You believe they won’t stop us by force?”
trans-unit.target: “You believe they won’t stop us by force?”

trans-unit.source: “They might try, of course. But Funbringer 3000 should be able to take a shot or two. Or maybe a few dozen. I hope! Which brings me to my next point: I believe with the amount of combat expertise you and your crew must have, not to mention your apparent disregard for your own safety, I think you’re the best ones for the job. Hence, we’d be eternally grateful if you were the ones to wear the suit and help us regain control of that outpost.”
trans-unit.target: “They might try, of course. But Funbringer 3000 should be able to take a shot or two. Or maybe a few dozen. I hope! Which brings me to my next point: I believe with the amount of combat expertise you and your crew must have, not to mention your apparent disregard for your own safety, I think you’re the best ones for the job. Hence, we’d be eternally grateful if you were the ones to wear the suit and help us regain control of that outpost.”

trans-unit.source: “We’d be happy to help you.”
trans-unit.target: “We’d be happy to help you.”

trans-unit.source: “Oh, marvelous! I knew you wouldn’t be able to resist. However this goes, I think you’re going to have plenty of fun. Here's the suit. I've marked the location of the outpost on your map.”
trans-unit.target: “Oh, marvelous! I knew you wouldn’t be able to resist. However this goes, I think you’re going to have plenty of fun. Here's the suit. I've marked the location of the outpost on your map.”

trans-unit.source: “We need to think about this a bit.”
trans-unit.target: “We need to think about this a bit.”

trans-unit.source: “Have you thought about our proposal? Would you be willing to wear Funbringer 3000 and help us regain control of that outpost?”
trans-unit.target: “Have you thought about our proposal? Would you be willing to wear Funbringer 3000 and help us regain control of that outpost?”

trans-unit.source: “We’d be happy to help you.”
trans-unit.target: “We’d be happy to help you.”

trans-unit.source: “We need to think about this a bit.”
trans-unit.target: “We need to think about this a bit.”

trans-unit.source: “We don’t have time for this right now.”
trans-unit.target: “We don’t have time for this right now.”

trans-unit.source: “Oh, oh, it’s you! You did it! Honestly, this was such a ridiculous plan I’m mildly surprised how well it worked! I don’t know how we could thank you enough, but the least we can do is let you keep the suit. Perhaps you’ll find some more use for it on your voyages.”
trans-unit.target: “Oh, oh, it’s you! You did it! Honestly, this was such a ridiculous plan I’m mildly surprised how well it worked! I don’t know how we could thank you enough, but the least we can do is let you keep the suit. Perhaps you’ll find some more use for it on your voyages.”

trans-unit.source: The Jestmaster looks at you inquisitively.
trans-unit.target: The Jestmaster looks at you inquisitively.

trans-unit.source: “Is there really no more advice you can give us?”
trans-unit.target: “Is there really no more advice you can give us?”

trans-unit.source: “I have a hunch where your path is going to eventually take you. When you get there, you will understand the rules of this game of life even more clearly than you do now. When all is laid bare before one's eyes, some may opt to stop playing along altogether, perhaps choosing a life of asceticism or stepping out of the tent completely. And that's fine! You're going to have to let the credits roll at some point. Others, like me and my Jestmaster colleagues, choose to keep playing our part, to keep the Fun going and to help others understand the nature of this game. That's a fine choice too! Whichever path you end up taking, I wish you lots of luck and amusement in your journey. Praise the Honkmother!”
trans-unit.target: “I have a hunch where your path is going to eventually take you. When you get there, you will understand the rules of this game of life even more clearly than you do now. When all is laid bare before one's eyes, some may opt to stop playing along altogether, perhaps choosing a life of asceticism or stepping out of the tent completely. And that's fine! You're going to have to let the credits roll at some point. Others, like me and my Jestmaster colleagues, choose to keep playing our part, to keep the Fun going and to help others understand the nature of this game. That's a fine choice too! Whichever path you end up taking, I wish you lots of luck and amusement in your journey. Praise the Honkmother!”

trans-unit.source: “Praise the Honkmother!”
trans-unit.target: “Praise the Honkmother!”

trans-unit.source: “Thanks!”
trans-unit.target: “Thanks!”

trans-unit.source: “I have to say, it is impressive how far you've made it on the path of the bike horn in such a short time. For many, the path is much longer, and some fail to find it at all.”
trans-unit.target: “I have to say, it is impressive how far you've made it on the path of the bike horn in such a short time. For many, the path is much longer, and some fail to find it at all.”

trans-unit.source: “So, what’s next?”
trans-unit.target: “So, what’s next?”

trans-unit.source: “I'm both happy and sad to say that this is as far as I can take you; the rest of the path you're going to have to walk by yourself. But I can also see that you already know the direction.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm both happy and sad to say that this is as far as I can take you; the rest of the path you're going to have to walk by yourself. But I can also see that you already know the direction.”

trans-unit.source: “This was it? You’re not going to tell me what the Honkmother is?”
trans-unit.target: “This was it? You’re not going to tell me what the Honkmother is?”

trans-unit.source: “Oh, silly you. What would you want to hear? That she’s the Fun flowing through our veins or the friends we made along the way? Three pounds of custard pie, perhaps? Or the monkey-god riding on a great turtle, the framework holding up this world around us? Those are all fun little words, but just like before, this is a topic where words fall short.”
trans-unit.target: “Oh, silly you. What would you want to hear? That she’s the Fun flowing through our veins or the friends we made along the way? Three pounds of custard pie, perhaps? Or the monkey-god riding on a great turtle, the framework holding up this world around us? Those are all fun little words, but just like before, this is a topic where words fall short.”

trans-unit.source: “To try to explain it in words would be as if I were explaining a joke, and well, it would just fall flat. Such is the Grand Joke of the Universe, too, beyond words, and one must not confuse the world of things as we name them with the world as it actually is.”
trans-unit.target: “To try to explain it in words would be as if I were explaining a joke, and well, it would just fall flat. Such is the Grand Joke of the Universe, too, beyond words, and one must not confuse the world of things as we name them with the world as it actually is.”

trans-unit.source: “Hello! I hear you’ve been commissioned to find us certain important documents. What’s the status?”
trans-unit.target: “Hello! I hear you’ve been commissioned to find us certain important documents. What’s the status?”

trans-unit.source: “I found the documents.”
trans-unit.target: “I found the documents.”

trans-unit.source: The outpost manager takes the papers and glances through them, eyes widened. “Oh, oh! This is huge! If these are authentic, there’s no question the Coalition mass-murdered everyone in Tormsdale. When these go out, it’s going to be a huge blow to them. I can’t thank you enough for this. I’ll put in a good word to Lt. Petran and make sure she knows it was your crew who accomplished this. I’m also going to pay you for your troubles, of course.”
trans-unit.target: The outpost manager takes the papers and glances through them, eyes widened. “Oh, oh! This is huge! If these are authentic, there’s no question the Coalition mass-murdered everyone in Tormsdale. When these go out, it’s going to be a huge blow to them. I can’t thank you enough for this. I’ll put in a good word to Lt. Petran and make sure she knows it was your crew who accomplished this. I’m also going to pay you for your troubles, of course.”

trans-unit.source: “Well, please bring them over! I can't wait to see what's in them.”
trans-unit.target: “Well, please bring them over! I can't wait to see what's in them.”

trans-unit.source: “I don’t have the documents right now.”
trans-unit.target: “I don’t have the documents right now.”

trans-unit.source: This must be the outpost manager. You need to figure out a way to get their ID card to gain access to the secure cabinet.
trans-unit.target: This must be the outpost manager. You need to figure out a way to get their ID card to gain access to the secure cabinet.

trans-unit.source: “Hello. We’re doing a Coalition-mandated security inspection and need to examine the secure cabinet in your office. Would you mind opening it for me?”
trans-unit.target: “Hello. We’re doing a Coalition-mandated security inspection and need to examine the secure cabinet in your office. Would you mind opening it for me?”

trans-unit.source: “Uhh… What? How stupid do you think I am? Get the fuck out of my office before I call security.”
trans-unit.target: “Uhh… What? How stupid do you think I am? Get the fuck out of my office before I call security.”

trans-unit.source: “Revolution is near. Give us your ID card or you’re dead.”
trans-unit.target: “Revolution is near. Give us your ID card or you’re dead.”

trans-unit.source: The man immediately pulls out his gun.
trans-unit.target: The man immediately pulls out his gun.

trans-unit.source: “Excuse me, sir! There’s some kind of a dispute a few decks down, and I was told to come get you.”
trans-unit.target: “Excuse me, sir! There’s some kind of a dispute a few decks down, and I was told to come get you.”

trans-unit.source: “I see. Show me the way!”
trans-unit.target: “I see. Show me the way!”

trans-unit.source: “I don't know if you're trying to mess with me or what, but I need to get back to work. Goodbye.”
trans-unit.target: “I don't know if you're trying to mess with me or what, but I need to get back to work. Goodbye.”

trans-unit.source: Ignore him and keep walking.
trans-unit.target: Ignore him and keep walking.

trans-unit.source: The toy hammer bops the abyssal beast, but nothing happens. You wonder what the point of all this was, until you realize it might be better to dismiss those thoughts for now and focus on making it out of here alive.
trans-unit.target: The toy hammer bops the abyssal beast, but nothing happens. You wonder what the point of all this was, until you realize it might be better to dismiss those thoughts for now and focus on making it out of here alive.

trans-unit.source: “I believe your crew has expressed an interest in learning more about our Church. Before we get any further, I'd like to ask you the same question my colleague already did: What is the Second Metamorphosis of the spirit?”
trans-unit.target: “I believe your crew has expressed an interest in learning more about our Church. Before we get any further, I'd like to ask you the same question my colleague already did: What is the Second Metamorphosis of the spirit?”

trans-unit.source: You overhear two robed figures in deep discussion. “To be honest, I find those kinds of drug-fueled sodomite parties distasteful, a perversion of what a real Communion ought to be.” The one wearing a more elaborately decorated robe shrugs. “As an Ecclesiast I must concur, although just between you and me, I do believe it can also be good for the acolytes to test their limits every once in a while—you must know where your limits are if you’re striving to surpass them!”
trans-unit.target: You overhear two robed figures in deep discussion. “To be honest, I find those kinds of drug-fueled sodomite parties distasteful, a perversion of what a real Communion ought to be.” The one wearing a more elaborately decorated robe shrugs. “As an Ecclesiast I must concur, although just between you and me, I do believe it can also be good for the acolytes to test their limits every once in a while—you must know where your limits are if you’re striving to surpass them!”

trans-unit.source: “Excuse me, did you say you’re an Ecclesiast of the Church of Husk?”
trans-unit.target: “Excuse me, did you say you’re an Ecclesiast of the Church of Husk?”

trans-unit.source: The robed man turns to look at you, and judging by his expression, you suspect you've just heard something not meant for your ears. “Who might you be, and what’s your business here?” he asks.
trans-unit.target: The robed man turns to look at you, and judging by his expression, you suspect you've just heard something not meant for your ears. “Who might you be, and what’s your business here?” he asks.

trans-unit.source: “Our crew has been looking for ways to learn more of the Church, and I've heard an Ecclesiast might be able to guide me.”
trans-unit.target: “Our crew has been looking for ways to learn more of the Church, and I've heard an Ecclesiast might be able to guide me.”

trans-unit.source: The man scoffs. “Does this look like a public school to you? Even if I had an interest in teaching every random submariner who happens to waltz in, how would I know you’re not some Coalition spy or a clown probing for information?”
trans-unit.target: The man scoffs. “Does this look like a public school to you? Even if I had an interest in teaching every random submariner who happens to waltz in, how would I know you’re not some Coalition spy or a clown probing for information?”

trans-unit.source: “Could we prove our good intentions by helping the Church in some way?”
trans-unit.target: “Could we prove our good intentions by helping the Church in some way?”

trans-unit.source: “That would in no way make you stand apart from the plethora of morally and spiritually devoid submarine crews going around doing tasks for whomever with no regard for what kind of party they’re supporting. What the Church is interested in is what you’re striving for, and how much you are willing to sacrifice to reach those aspirations.”
trans-unit.target: “That would in no way make you stand apart from the plethora of morally and spiritually devoid submarine crews going around doing tasks for whomever with no regard for what kind of party they’re supporting. What the Church is interested in is what you’re striving for, and how much you are willing to sacrifice to reach those aspirations.”

trans-unit.source: “Is there any other way for us to prove our sincerity?”
trans-unit.target: “Is there any other way for us to prove our sincerity?”

trans-unit.source: “For that, you’ve got a long way to go, kid. But what the hell, let's try something. To prove that you at the very least have some kind of an understanding of our doctrine, answer me this. What is the Second Metamorphosis of the spirit?”
trans-unit.target: “For that, you’ve got a long way to go, kid. But what the hell, let's try something. To prove that you at the very least have some kind of an understanding of our doctrine, answer me this. What is the Second Metamorphosis of the spirit?”

trans-unit.source: “Emerging from the cocoon of your human body.”
trans-unit.target: “Emerging from the cocoon of your human body.”

trans-unit.source: The man snickers and shakes his head. “As I thought. You have some more learning to do on your own, and until you do, I have nothing more to say to you.”
trans-unit.target: The man snickers and shakes his head. “As I thought. You have some more learning to do on your own, and until you do, I have nothing more to say to you.”

trans-unit.source: “Becoming one with the symbiote.”
trans-unit.target: “Becoming one with the symbiote.”

trans-unit.source: “Emptying the chalice of the stale wine.”
trans-unit.target: “Emptying the chalice of the stale wine.”

trans-unit.source: “I must admit I’m surprised a submariner would be familiar with the concept of the Three Metamorphoses. That being said, you’ve still got a long way to go to truly prove yourself. But perhaps we can think of something. We have a certain Church event coming up soon for which we’ll need copious amounts of ‘wafers’ to feed all the attendants. I’m sure you see what I’m getting at.”
trans-unit.target: “I must admit I’m surprised a submariner would be familiar with the concept of the Three Metamorphoses. That being said, you’ve still got a long way to go to truly prove yourself. But perhaps we can think of something. We have a certain Church event coming up soon for which we’ll need copious amounts of ‘wafers’ to feed all the attendants. I’m sure you see what I’m getting at.”

trans-unit.source: “You want me to get you husk eggs?”
trans-unit.target: “You want me to get you husk eggs?”

trans-unit.source: “That’s another way to put it, yes. Not only would this be a test of your dedication, I believe it could aid you and your crew toward the First Metamorphosis. To descend to the deepest depths, to dive bravely into the foulest of waters. So, to put it simply: Bring me or one of my colleagues a dozen vials of husk eggs, and then we’ll talk more.”
trans-unit.target: “That’s another way to put it, yes. Not only would this be a test of your dedication, I believe it could aid you and your crew toward the First Metamorphosis. To descend to the deepest depths, to dive bravely into the foulest of waters. So, to put it simply: Bring me or one of my colleagues a dozen vials of husk eggs, and then we’ll talk more.”

trans-unit.source: “I’m afraid I don’t know. Yet.”
trans-unit.target: “I’m afraid I don’t know. Yet.”

trans-unit.source: “There is some wisdom in knowing and admitting your limits. You have some more learning to do on your own, but until you do, I have nothing more to say to you.”
trans-unit.target: “There is some wisdom in knowing and admitting your limits. You have some more learning to do on your own, but until you do, I have nothing more to say to you.”

trans-unit.source: “If it’s of any worth, we’d happily pay you for your troubles.”
trans-unit.target: “If it’s of any worth, we’d happily pay you for your troubles.”

trans-unit.source: “Of course. As a submariner you must've come to think throwing money at people is the way to make them do your bidding, but the very proposal suggests you have very little idea of what we’re striving for here in the Church.”
trans-unit.target: “Of course. As a submariner you must've come to think throwing money at people is the way to make them do your bidding, but the very proposal suggests you have very little idea of what we’re striving for here in the Church.”

trans-unit.source: “Sorry, I must've confused you with someone else. I'll get going now!”
trans-unit.target: “Sorry, I must've confused you with someone else. I'll get going now!”

trans-unit.source: Sounds like this man is some kind of a big shot of the Husk Cult. Better alert the outpost security.
trans-unit.target: Sounds like this man is some kind of a big shot of the Husk Cult. Better alert the outpost security.

trans-unit.source: You contact the outpost security via radio, informing them of the suspicious activity going on in this module.
trans-unit.target: You contact the outpost security via radio, informing them of the suspicious activity going on in this module.

trans-unit.source: This seems shady. Better to not get involved.
trans-unit.target: This seems shady. Better to not get involved.

trans-unit.source: “I believe the Church has given you an assignment of sorts. Have you acquired the ‘wafers’?”
trans-unit.target: “I believe the Church has given you an assignment of sorts. Have you acquired the ‘wafers’?”

trans-unit.source: “Have you made your decision—do you want to become an acolyte of the Church?”
trans-unit.target: “Have you made your decision—do you want to become an acolyte of the Church?”

trans-unit.source: “I've obtained 12 vials of husk eggs, as asked.”
trans-unit.target: “I've obtained 12 vials of husk eggs, as asked.”

trans-unit.source: The Ecclesiast's eyes widen as you take out the vials. He swiftly yanks them from your hands and shoves them inside his robes. “It’s starting to seem our doubts about your crew may have been unfounded. I hope you can forgive our distrust; it’s not every day submariners come to show this kind of attitude toward us. But I suppose that’s understandable. We shouldn’t expect sympathy from people whose understanding of the Husk is solely based on encounters with the feral ones.”
trans-unit.target: The Ecclesiast's eyes widen as you take out the vials. He swiftly yanks them from your hands and shoves them inside his robes. “It’s starting to seem our doubts about your crew may have been unfounded. I hope you can forgive our distrust; it’s not every day submariners come to show this kind of attitude toward us. But I suppose that’s understandable. We shouldn’t expect sympathy from people whose understanding of the Husk is solely based on encounters with the feral ones.”

trans-unit.source: “Please bring them to me and we'll carry on from there.”
trans-unit.target: “Please bring them to me and we'll carry on from there.”

trans-unit.source: “Fair enough. Would you be willing to tell us more about the Church now?”
trans-unit.target: “Fair enough. Would you be willing to tell us more about the Church now?”

trans-unit.source: “This thirst for knowledge is a promising sign. Yes, we’ve discussed the matter with the Ecclesiarchy, and we are willing to appoint you as acolytes of the Church of Husk if that is your desire.”
trans-unit.target: “This thirst for knowledge is a promising sign. Yes, we’ve discussed the matter with the Ecclesiarchy, and we are willing to appoint you as acolytes of the Church of Husk if that is your desire.”

trans-unit.source: “What does that mean in practice?”
trans-unit.target: “What does that mean in practice?”

trans-unit.source: “It means we will help you in your personal strive for Ascension, and you will help the Church in our collective pursuit of a better humankind, or rather, a kind that is something more than human. Our members are not obliged to much—everyone serves according to their own volition and capabilities—but we do of course hope your crew keeps contributing to our cause, much as you already have been doing. Feel free to take your time to consider the offer. Let me know when you’ve made up your mind.”
trans-unit.target: “It means we will help you in your personal strive for Ascension, and you will help the Church in our collective pursuit of a better humankind, or rather, a kind that is something more than human. Our members are not obliged to much—everyone serves according to their own volition and capabilities—but we do of course hope your crew keeps contributing to our cause, much as you already have been doing. Feel free to take your time to consider the offer. Let me know when you’ve made up your mind.”

trans-unit.source: “Still working on it.”
trans-unit.target: “Still working on it.”

trans-unit.source: “Yes, I want to join you.”
trans-unit.target: “Yes, I want to join you.”

trans-unit.source: “Then we shall make it be. Do you accept Ascension as your utmost goal, as well as the utmost goal for humankind?”
trans-unit.target: “Then we shall make it be. Do you accept Ascension as your utmost goal, as well as the utmost goal for humankind?”

trans-unit.source: “Yes.”
trans-unit.target: “Yes.”

trans-unit.source: “Then we shall make it be. Do you accept to renounce your humanity and thus bring forth the quintessential form?”
trans-unit.target: “Then we shall make it be. Do you accept to renounce your humanity and thus bring forth the quintessential form?”

trans-unit.source: “Then we shall make it be. Do you accept to become one with the fortitude of the world and thus bring forth the quintessential form?”
trans-unit.target: “Then we shall make it be. Do you accept to become one with the fortitude of the world and thus bring forth the quintessential form?”

trans-unit.source: “Then we shall make it be; we welcome you to our family. I'm pleased to have you with us! In fact, I believe our whole Church all the way up to the Arch-Ecclesiasts will be pleased to hear the news.”
trans-unit.target: “Then we shall make it be; we welcome you to our family. I'm pleased to have you with us! In fact, I believe our whole Church all the way up to the Arch-Ecclesiasts will be pleased to hear the news.”

trans-unit.source: “So, what happens next?”
trans-unit.target: “So, what happens next?”

trans-unit.source: “That is largely up to you—as said, everyone in the Church serves according to their own volition. If you're looking for pointers, the Book of Chalices might be a good starting point.” The Ecclesiast hands you a paper scroll. “Take it to your heart and you'll be better prepared when the time comes for your next task.”
trans-unit.target: “That is largely up to you—as said, everyone in the Church serves according to their own volition. If you're looking for pointers, the Book of Chalices might be a good starting point.” The Ecclesiast hands you a paper scroll. “Take it to your heart and you'll be better prepared when the time comes for your next task.”

trans-unit.source: “I still need to think about this.”
trans-unit.target: “I still need to think about this.”

trans-unit.source: “A pleasure to run into you again. The timing couldn't have been better, as we have something we could use your help with. This is considerably more sensitive than the jobs you’ve been doing so far. We need someone competent, someone we know the Church can trust, and we’ve come to think your crew might fit the bill.”
trans-unit.target: “A pleasure to run into you again. The timing couldn't have been better, as we have something we could use your help with. This is considerably more sensitive than the jobs you’ve been doing so far. We need someone competent, someone we know the Church can trust, and we’ve come to think your crew might fit the bill.”

trans-unit.source: “I’m interested.”
trans-unit.target: “I’m interested.”

trans-unit.source: “According to our informants, a Coalition operative has infiltrated one of our sects to investigate the Church. There's a chance he may have gained access to very sensitive information, including the identities and whereabouts of some of our Arch-Ecclesiasts. We have reason to believe he's currently in a nearby outpost, so now's our chance to take action and make sure he'll talk to no one.”
trans-unit.target: “According to our informants, a Coalition operative has infiltrated one of our sects to investigate the Church. There's a chance he may have gained access to very sensitive information, including the identities and whereabouts of some of our Arch-Ecclesiasts. We have reason to believe he's currently in a nearby outpost, so now's our chance to take action and make sure he'll talk to no one.”

trans-unit.source: “I see. We'll take care of it.”
trans-unit.target: “I see. We'll take care of it.”

trans-unit.source: “Are you telling me to murder someone?!”
trans-unit.target: “Are you telling me to murder someone?!”

trans-unit.source: “Have you not read 'The Three Metamorphoses'? That's the miasma talking. You need to let go of these factitious human notions of morals. Besides, have you not murdered countless of beings during your voyages? How's this any different, aside from being of extreme importance to our cause?”
trans-unit.target: “Have you not read 'The Three Metamorphoses'? That's the miasma talking. You need to let go of these factitious human notions of morals. Besides, have you not murdered countless of beings during your voyages? How's this any different, aside from being of extreme importance to our cause?”

trans-unit.source: “I suppose you're right.”
trans-unit.target: “I suppose you're right.”

trans-unit.source: “I'll mark the location on your map. Make sure you do the deed discreetly: We don't want any more curious eyes prying on us.”
trans-unit.target: “I'll mark the location on your map. Make sure you do the deed discreetly: We don't want any more curious eyes prying on us.”

trans-unit.source: “We've been informed your task was a success. I knew we could count on you! Unfortunately, we have another, even more urgent matter we need to discuss.”
trans-unit.target: “We've been informed your task was a success. I knew we could count on you! Unfortunately, we have another, even more urgent matter we need to discuss.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm all ears.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm all ears.”

trans-unit.source: “As you surely know, the Coalition has put a bounty on Jacov Subra, one of our Arch-Ecclesiasts.”
trans-unit.target: “As you surely know, the Coalition has put a bounty on Jacov Subra, one of our Arch-Ecclesiasts.”

trans-unit.source: “That's a familiar name, but I don't really know much.”
trans-unit.target: “That's a familiar name, but I don't really know much.”

trans-unit.source: “He's one of our Arch-Ecclesiasts, although he likes to go by the title 'Head Organizer.' He's the man behind the 'Church of the Mollusc' festival, an event that's been an excellent tool in recruiting new members. He's currently hiding from authorities in a certain abandoned outpost, and we have reason to believe a crew looking to score the bounty has discovered his whereabouts. It could be the operative you 'met' did talk to someone after all.”
trans-unit.target: “He's one of our Arch-Ecclesiasts, although he likes to go by the title 'Head Organizer.' He's the man behind the 'Church of the Mollusc' festival, an event that's been an excellent tool in recruiting new members. He's currently hiding from authorities in a certain abandoned outpost, and we have reason to believe a crew looking to score the bounty has discovered his whereabouts. It could be the operative you 'met' did talk to someone after all.”

trans-unit.source: “How can we help?”
trans-unit.target: “How can we help?”

trans-unit.source: “We need you to get to him before the bounty hunters do, and get him to safety. I'll mark the location on your map. I can't stress enough how urgent this is, so let's not waste any more time. Go—we'll talk more when he's safe.”
trans-unit.target: “We need you to get to him before the bounty hunters do, and get him to safety. I'll mark the location on your map. I can't stress enough how urgent this is, so let's not waste any more time. Go—we'll talk more when he's safe.”

trans-unit.source: “Welcome. We've been waiting for you.”
trans-unit.target: “Welcome. We've been waiting for you.”

trans-unit.source: “Is this everyone—shall we begin?”
trans-unit.target: “Is this everyone—shall we begin?”

trans-unit.source: “Let's do it.”
trans-unit.target: “Let's do it.”

trans-unit.source: The robed congregation starts to hum a melody, and the Ecclesiast raises his arms. “My brethren, verily our chalices empty, thirsting for wine, fresh and untainted.” One of the acolytes hands out vials of husk eggs to the congregation.
trans-unit.target: The robed congregation starts to hum a melody, and the Ecclesiast raises his arms. “My brethren, verily our chalices empty, thirsting for wine, fresh and untainted.” One of the acolytes hands out vials of husk eggs to the congregation.

trans-unit.source: Take the eggs.
trans-unit.target: Take the eggs.

trans-unit.source: “O spirit of life, let us fill our chalice with your fortitude. Let us become one and quell the world's outcast. Let us accept your Gift and bring forth the quintessential form.” The ecclesiast raises up the vial, and the rest of the robed figures follow the lead.
trans-unit.target: “O spirit of life, let us fill our chalice with your fortitude. Let us become one and quell the world's outcast. Let us accept your Gift and bring forth the quintessential form.” The ecclesiast raises up the vial, and the rest of the robed figures follow the lead.

trans-unit.source: Raise the vial.
trans-unit.target: Raise the vial.

trans-unit.source: “Let us become heralds of the tide, strong steams amidst the water. Lo, the mighty the Husk!”. Everyone gulps down the contents of the vials.
trans-unit.target: “Let us become heralds of the tide, strong steams amidst the water. Lo, the mighty the Husk!”. Everyone gulps down the contents of the vials.

trans-unit.source: Gulp down the eggs.
trans-unit.target: Gulp down the eggs.

trans-unit.source: You feel the symbiote squirming and growing inside you. What is this? How is it happening this rapidly? Before you manage to process the questions, they seem to dissolve into nothing. Your mind feels… No, "you" are gone now. We are one now, and we no longer need to fear or worry.
trans-unit.target: You feel the symbiote squirming and growing inside you. What is this? How is it happening this rapidly? Before you manage to process the questions, they seem to dissolve into nothing. Your mind feels… No, "you" are gone now. We are one now, and we no longer need to fear or worry.

trans-unit.source: “We can speak?”
trans-unit.target: “We can speak?”

trans-unit.source: The Ecclesiast, now with a squirming ovipositor hanging from his mouth, turns to look at you. “Of course. Our bodies and minds are of more value to us this way.” The Ecclesiast waves at the others, still spasming on the floor. “Unlike these frail ones. Them we shall consume.”
trans-unit.target: The Ecclesiast, now with a squirming ovipositor hanging from his mouth, turns to look at you. “Of course. Our bodies and minds are of more value to us this way.” The Ecclesiast waves at the others, still spasming on the floor. “Unlike these frail ones. Them we shall consume.”

trans-unit.source: “What's next?”
trans-unit.target: “What's next?”

trans-unit.source: “That is for you to find out. But now, go—the humans must be coming. We'll meet again.”
trans-unit.target: “That is for you to find out. But now, go—the humans must be coming. We'll meet again.”

trans-unit.source: “Hold on. We need a moment.”
trans-unit.target: “Hold on. We need a moment.”

trans-unit.source: “What is this?”
trans-unit.target: “What is this?”

trans-unit.source: “Ever since our paths crossed, your work for the Church has been nothing short of exceptional. But saving the life of an Arch-Ecclesiast, that's an insurmountable achievement, one we'll be forever in your debt for. Thus, we've decided to host a Communion for you. You're ready. Please gather the rest of your crew here and we'll commence.”
trans-unit.target: “Ever since our paths crossed, your work for the Church has been nothing short of exceptional. But saving the life of an Arch-Ecclesiast, that's an insurmountable achievement, one we'll be forever in your debt for. Thus, we've decided to host a Communion for you. You're ready. Please gather the rest of your crew here and we'll commence.”

trans-unit.source: The operative investigating the Church of Husk you've been tasked to assassinate should be somewhere in this outpost.
trans-unit.target: The operative investigating the Church of Husk you've been tasked to assassinate should be somewhere in this outpost.

trans-unit.source: This must be the informant. You try to think of how to go about this.
trans-unit.target: This must be the informant. You try to think of how to go about this.

trans-unit.source: “You've stuck your nose somewhere you shouldn't have, fleshbag…”
trans-unit.target: “You've stuck your nose somewhere you shouldn't have, fleshbag…”

trans-unit.source: The man immediately pulls out his gun.
trans-unit.target: The man immediately pulls out his gun.

trans-unit.source: “Sir, could you please help me? My friend's injured and I need help getting him to the medical module. Please, follow me!”
trans-unit.target: “Sir, could you please help me? My friend's injured and I need help getting him to the medical module. Please, follow me!”

trans-unit.source: “Of course. Lead the way!”
trans-unit.target: “Of course. Lead the way!”

trans-unit.source: “Okay, what the hell is this? Are you just trying to waste my time? I need to get back to work.”
trans-unit.target: “Okay, what the hell is this? Are you just trying to waste my time? I need to get back to work.”

trans-unit.source: Ignore him and keep walking.
trans-unit.target: Ignore him and keep walking.

trans-unit.source: “You'll never take me alive!”
trans-unit.target: “You'll never take me alive!”

trans-unit.source: “Easy there, brother! We were sent by the Church.”
trans-unit.target: “Easy there, brother! We were sent by the Church.”

trans-unit.source: “Ahh! I heard some chatter about the bounty on the radio, and was sure someone else got to me first.”
trans-unit.target: “Ahh! I heard some chatter about the bounty on the radio, and was sure someone else got to me first.”

trans-unit.source: “…You did? I don't think that was us.”
trans-unit.target: “…You did? I don't think that was us.”

trans-unit.source: “Well, shit. I guess we'd better keep our weapons ready and get out of here stat. You lead the way.”
