trans-unit.target: “Well, shit. I guess we'd better keep our weapons ready and get out of here stat. You lead the way.”

trans-unit.source: “Phew, I was worried for a second there! I presume you won't mind if I stick around until we get a bit further from those bounty hunters?”
trans-unit.target: “Phew, I was worried for a second there! I presume you won't mind if I stick around until we get a bit further from those bounty hunters?”

trans-unit.source: “Cheers! I'll hop off at the next location.”
trans-unit.target: “Cheers! I'll hop off at the next location.”

trans-unit.source: “Say, how's emptying that chalice of yours and all that jazz going?”
trans-unit.target: “Say, how's emptying that chalice of yours and all that jazz going?”

trans-unit.source: “I'm not sure.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm not sure.”

trans-unit.source: “Just between you and me, my associates are getting pretty damn sure.”
trans-unit.target: “Just between you and me, my associates are getting pretty damn sure.”

trans-unit.source: “So, if I were you, I'd start to consider the possibility of taking the final leap. The opportunity might present itself sooner than you think.”
trans-unit.target: “So, if I were you, I'd start to consider the possibility of taking the final leap. The opportunity might present itself sooner than you think.”

trans-unit.source: “Do you think I should?”
trans-unit.target: “Do you think I should?”

trans-unit.source: “Well, as you can obviously see, I'm still very much a dumb ape made of flesh and gunk—that has its benefits when you've got to mingle with the other apes. So I'm not the one to answer that question. You've got to make the choice yourself.”
trans-unit.target: “Well, as you can obviously see, I'm still very much a dumb ape made of flesh and gunk—that has its benefits when you've got to mingle with the other apes. So I'm not the one to answer that question. You've got to make the choice yourself.”

trans-unit.source: “Not at all! Make yourself at home.”
trans-unit.target: “Not at all! Make yourself at home.”

trans-unit.source: A couple of robed figures are huddled around someone lying on the floor. You're not sure if they're trying to restrain or resuscitate the person—who is convulsing violently, as if having some kind of a seizure. One of the robed figures notices you. “Hey, you! Throw me a syringe of calyxanide from that cabinet over there!”
trans-unit.target: A couple of robed figures are huddled around someone lying on the floor. You're not sure if they're trying to restrain or resuscitate the person—who is convulsing violently, as if having some kind of a seizure. One of the robed figures notices you. “Hey, you! Throw me a syringe of calyxanide from that cabinet over there!”

trans-unit.source: Toss them a syringe from the cabinet next to you.
trans-unit.target: Toss them a syringe from the cabinet next to you.

trans-unit.source: You toss them the syringe that says "calyxanide," and as soon as they inject it in the spasming man's neck, he settles down. One of the robed figures seems angry. “Mark, you impatient idiot, how many times have we told you you're not ready for the Gift yet?!”
trans-unit.target: You toss them the syringe that says "calyxanide," and as soon as they inject it in the spasming man's neck, he settles down. One of the robed figures seems angry. “Mark, you impatient idiot, how many times have we told you you're not ready for the Gift yet?!”

trans-unit.source: “What is going on here?”
trans-unit.target: “What is going on here?”

trans-unit.source: The robed characters turn to look at you. Getting a better look at their faces, they seem very young. “We just had a little medical emergency of sorts. Our friend thought it would be fun to...go on a little trip, if you know what I mean. Thanks for the help! If you don't mind, let's keep this just between us.”
trans-unit.target: The robed characters turn to look at you. Getting a better look at their faces, they seem very young. “We just had a little medical emergency of sorts. Our friend thought it would be fun to...go on a little trip, if you know what I mean. Thanks for the help! If you don't mind, let's keep this just between us.”

trans-unit.source: “This feels awfully suspicious. Tell me what you were doing to that man or I'll report you to the authorities.”
trans-unit.target: “This feels awfully suspicious. Tell me what you were doing to that man or I'll report you to the authorities.”

trans-unit.source: The group glance at each other nervously. “Look, we don't want any trouble. Our brother here was too eager to meet the great husk, and it was taking him over. But we've got it contained now, and everyone is fine. Won't happen again. No need to tell the whole outpost, or our sect for that matter. It would ruin our careers if they found out he tried to jump the line!”
trans-unit.target: The group glance at each other nervously. “Look, we don't want any trouble. Our brother here was too eager to meet the great husk, and it was taking him over. But we've got it contained now, and everyone is fine. Won't happen again. No need to tell the whole outpost, or our sect for that matter. It would ruin our careers if they found out he tried to jump the line!”

trans-unit.source: “Your sect? You're members of the Church of the Husk? I thought your whole schtick was to get taken over by the parasite.”
trans-unit.target: “Your sect? You're members of the Church of the Husk? I thought your whole schtick was to get taken over by the parasite.”

trans-unit.source: “Parasite? A parasite does nothing but take; the husk gives! It can take you way beyond the limits of that fleshbag you call your body! But not like this, not if you're not ready to take it in. Or, ahem, so the Ecclesiasts speak, anyway.”
trans-unit.target: “Parasite? A parasite does nothing but take; the husk gives! It can take you way beyond the limits of that fleshbag you call your body! But not like this, not if you're not ready to take it in. Or, ahem, so the Ecclesiasts speak, anyway.”

trans-unit.source: Enough of this cultist bullshit. Alert the outpost security.
trans-unit.target: Enough of this cultist bullshit. Alert the outpost security.

trans-unit.source: You contact outpost security via radio, informing them of the suspicious activity going on in this module.
trans-unit.target: You contact outpost security via radio, informing them of the suspicious activity going on in this module.

trans-unit.source: “I've grown quite fond of this fleshbag, thank you. I'll see myself out now.”
trans-unit.target: “I've grown quite fond of this fleshbag, thank you. I'll see myself out now.”

trans-unit.source: “If I wanted to rise beyond those limits, how would I go about that?”
trans-unit.target: “If I wanted to rise beyond those limits, how would I go about that?”

trans-unit.source: “Easy, dear brothers. I just want to know why you'd want to stop this man's transformation into a husk.”
trans-unit.target: “Easy, dear brothers. I just want to know why you'd want to stop this man's transformation into a husk.”

trans-unit.source: Their stern expressions ease up. “You saw the way he was spasming, didn't you? That's not what an ascension looks like. The symbiote was about to consume him, to take him over. He's clearly not ready to be one with the symbiote yet.”
trans-unit.target: Their stern expressions ease up. “You saw the way he was spasming, didn't you? That's not what an ascension looks like. The symbiote was about to consume him, to take him over. He's clearly not ready to be one with the symbiote yet.”

trans-unit.source: “I see. If one was interested in 'becoming one with the symbiote,' how should they go about that?”
trans-unit.target: “I see. If one was interested in 'becoming one with the symbiote,' how should they go about that?”

trans-unit.source: “Well, to be honest, we're just fresh converts. I don't know if we're the best people to answer that. Our Ecclesiasts say you need to be ready for the Gift, to truly open up your heart, mind, and all parts of your flesh before you can take the Communion. There's these...rituals, and tools, for appeasing and welcoming the holy symbiote and bringing about the metamorphosis. But we don't really know much about those yet. I'm sure an Ecclesiast would happily tell you more, if you can find one!”
trans-unit.target: “Well, to be honest, we're just fresh converts. I don't know if we're the best people to answer that. Our Ecclesiasts say you need to be ready for the Gift, to truly open up your heart, mind, and all parts of your flesh before you can take the Communion. There's these...rituals, and tools, for appeasing and welcoming the holy symbiote and bringing about the metamorphosis. But we don't really know much about those yet. I'm sure an Ecclesiast would happily tell you more, if you can find one!”

trans-unit.source: Wish the charming young fellows farewell and a pleasant and timely ascension.
trans-unit.target: Wish the charming young fellows farewell and a pleasant and timely ascension.

trans-unit.source: Enough of this cultist bullshit. Alert the outpost security.
trans-unit.target: Enough of this cultist bullshit. Alert the outpost security.

trans-unit.source: “I thought your whole schtick was to get taken over by the parasite.”
trans-unit.target: “I thought your whole schtick was to get taken over by the parasite.”

trans-unit.source: This seems shady. Better to not get involved.
trans-unit.target: This seems shady. Better to not get involved.

trans-unit.source: This does not look like a usual husk infection: Somehow, the patient can still speak, and seems to have retained their mental faculties.
trans-unit.target: This does not look like a usual husk infection: Somehow, the patient can still speak, and seems to have retained their mental faculties.

trans-unit.source: Husk symbiosis
trans-unit.target: Husk symbiosis

trans-unit.source: BREAKING NEWS
trans-unit.target: BREAKING NEWS

trans-unit.source: [amount] [faction] reputation required
trans-unit.target: [amount] [faction] reputation required

trans-unit.source: Huskified Storage Container
trans-unit.target: Huskified Storage Container

trans-unit.source: Aunt Doris
trans-unit.target: Aunt Doris

trans-unit.source: Ignatius May
trans-unit.target: Ignatius May

trans-unit.source: Jestmaster
trans-unit.target: Jestmaster

trans-unit.source: Sootman
trans-unit.target: Sootman

trans-unit.source: Victoria Petran
trans-unit.target: Victoria Petran

trans-unit.source: Honker Blast
trans-unit.target: Honker Blast

trans-unit.source: This vessel is hereby confiscated by the Europa Coalition!
trans-unit.target: This vessel is hereby confiscated by the Europa Coalition!

trans-unit.source: The price for treason against the Coalition is death!
trans-unit.target: The price for treason against the Coalition is death!

trans-unit.source: We're not letting you terrorist scum out of here alive!
trans-unit.target: We're not letting you terrorist scum out of here alive!

trans-unit.source: We know you're plotting with the Separatists! We're putting an end to that right now.
trans-unit.target: We know you're plotting with the Separatists! We're putting an end to that right now.

trans-unit.source: Long live the Coalition!
trans-unit.target: Long live the Coalition!

trans-unit.source: A small nuclear device meant to be fired from a grenade launcher.
trans-unit.target: A small nuclear device meant to be fired from a grenade launcher.

trans-unit.source: An exotic fruit originating from Earth. Quite tasty, and rich in potassium.
trans-unit.target: An exotic fruit originating from Earth. Quite tasty, and rich in potassium.

trans-unit.source: Rich in potassium. Can be a safety hazard if left lying on the floor.
trans-unit.target: Rich in potassium. Can be a safety hazard if left lying on the floor.

trans-unit.source: A crate large enough to fit a prankster inside.
trans-unit.target: A crate large enough to fit a prankster inside.

trans-unit.source: The clowning achievement of Honkmotherian technology: a nuclear-powered exosuit equipped with weapons of mass pranking.
trans-unit.target: The clowning achievement of Honkmotherian technology: a nuclear-powered exosuit equipped with weapons of mass pranking.

trans-unit.source: A dark garment traditionally worn by acolytes of the Church of Husk. Imbued with pheromones that pacify feral husks, helping the acolytes stay safe until they're ready to ascend.
trans-unit.target: A dark garment traditionally worn by acolytes of the Church of Husk. Imbued with pheromones that pacify feral husks, helping the acolytes stay safe until they're ready to ascend.

trans-unit.source: A pair of cymbals used in Honkmotherian meditation practices. The unique acoustic properties of dementonite give the cymbals a very distinctive and obscenely loud sound that can be extremely disorientating to the uninitiated.
trans-unit.target: A pair of cymbals used in Honkmotherian meditation practices. The unique acoustic properties of dementonite give the cymbals a very distinctive and obscenely loud sound that can be extremely disorientating to the uninitiated.

trans-unit.source: A specimen of Velonaceps Calyx residing within a storage container. Makes for a handy autonomous container, albeit a short-lived one, since the husk rarely lives long inside an inorganic shell.
trans-unit.target: A specimen of Velonaceps Calyx residing within a storage container. Makes for a handy autonomous container, albeit a short-lived one, since the husk rarely lives long inside an inorganic shell.

trans-unit.source: A cheap improvised incendiary weapon.
trans-unit.target: A cheap improvised incendiary weapon.

trans-unit.source: A set of body armor, partially fashioned out of improvised materials by the Jovian Separatists. It's heavier than it looks.
trans-unit.target: A set of body armor, partially fashioned out of improvised materials by the Jovian Separatists. It's heavier than it looks.

trans-unit.source: A customized ballistic helmet. Despite the crude improvements made to it, the helmet seems surprisingly sturdy.
trans-unit.target: A customized ballistic helmet. Despite the crude improvements made to it, the helmet seems surprisingly sturdy.

trans-unit.source: Commonly used in the rituals of the Church of Husk. Contains pheromones that pacify feral husks and chemicals with mild healing properties.

trans-unit.source: “Always happy to run into you folks! You know, I actually had a fun idea I'd like to talk to you about.”
trans-unit.target: “Always happy to run into you folks! You know, I actually had a fun idea I'd like to talk to you about.”

trans-unit.source: “Of course, I'm all ears!”
trans-unit.target: “Of course, I'm all ears!”

trans-unit.source: “You see, life inside the confines of this outpost can get quite dull at times. It's not often we get visitors I could guide on their path, and I can't help wondering how much more I could give if I embarked on a journey like yours. A joke you've never heard before tends to be funnier than one you've heard a thousand times, wouldn't you agree?”
trans-unit.target: “You see, life inside the confines of this outpost can get quite dull at times. It's not often we get visitors I could guide on their path, and I can't help wondering how much more I could give if I embarked on a journey like yours. A joke you've never heard before tends to be funnier than one you've heard a thousand times, wouldn't you agree?”

trans-unit.source: “I see what you mean. Do tell me about this idea of yours!”
trans-unit.target: “I see what you mean. Do tell me about this idea of yours!”

trans-unit.source: “I was wondering, would your crew happen to have any room for an extra assistant? Getting to join you on your adventures would make this old fool happier than you can imagine. Even though I've never been a submariner, I've got quite a few tricks up my sleeve that might be of use to use.”
trans-unit.target: “I was wondering, would your crew happen to have any room for an extra assistant? Getting to join you on your adventures would make this old fool happier than you can imagine. Even though I've never been a submariner, I've got quite a few tricks up my sleeve that might be of use to use.”

trans-unit.source: “By the Honkmother, of course! Welcome on board!”
trans-unit.target: “By the Honkmother, of course! Welcome on board!”

trans-unit.source: “Wonderful! I'm honored to join you.”
trans-unit.target: “Wonderful! I'm honored to join you.”

trans-unit.source: “We need to think about this a bit.”
trans-unit.target: “We need to think about this a bit.”

trans-unit.source: “I understand. I'm sure you'll run into me again—let me know when you've made up your mind!”
trans-unit.target: “I understand. I'm sure you'll run into me again—let me know when you've made up your mind!”

trans-unit.source: “I think we have room for an extra assistant. Welcome on board!”
trans-unit.target: “I think we have room for an extra assistant. Welcome on board!”

trans-unit.source: “I'm afraid we don't have room for more crew, but I'll let you know if that changes!”
trans-unit.target: “I'm afraid we don't have room for more crew, but I'll let you know if that changes!”

trans-unit.source: “A jolly day to you! Have you thought about my proposal? Would you be willing to let me join you folks?”
trans-unit.target: “A jolly day to you! Have you thought about my proposal? Would you be willing to let me join you folks?”

trans-unit.source: An announcement comes over the PA: “Calling the crew of the vessel that just docked. Please report to administration immediately.”
trans-unit.target: An announcement comes over the PA: “Calling the crew of the vessel that just docked. Please report to administration immediately.”

trans-unit.source: An old man in an expensive-looking uniform walks up to you and shakes your hand. “Ah, there you are. I was starting to wonder whether the PA system worked. Anyhow, it's a pleasure to meet you! I heard your crew was heading this way and had to come and meet you in person. If you can spare a moment, I'd like to propose you something.”
trans-unit.target: An old man in an expensive-looking uniform walks up to you and shakes your hand. “Ah, there you are. I was starting to wonder whether the PA system worked. Anyhow, it's a pleasure to meet you! I heard your crew was heading this way and had to come and meet you in person. If you can spare a moment, I'd like to propose you something.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm sorry, who are you again?”
trans-unit.target: “I'm sorry, who are you again?”

trans-unit.source: “Ah, excuse my manners—it's not every day I get to meet a national hero like you! Ignatius May, the Captain of Internal Affairs of the Europa Coalition. I've been keeping an eye on your crew's accomplishments for some time now, and in fact, many of the missions you've undertaken were commissioned by me. On behalf of the Europa Coalition, I would like to extend our utmost gratitude to you and your crew for your service.”
trans-unit.target: “Ah, excuse my manners—it's not every day I get to meet a national hero like you! Ignatius May, the Captain of Internal Affairs of the Europa Coalition. I've been keeping an eye on your crew's accomplishments for some time now, and in fact, many of the missions you've undertaken were commissioned by me. On behalf of the Europa Coalition, I would like to extend our utmost gratitude to you and your crew for your service.”

trans-unit.source: “Thank you, sir! Might I ask what this proposition is you mentioned?”
trans-unit.target: “Thank you, sir! Might I ask what this proposition is you mentioned?”

trans-unit.source: “Straight to business, eh? I like it! To cut to the chase, I'm looking to join your crew. It's been a long time since I've seen some real action, and your crew's endeavors have made me itch to get back out there, to really get my hands dirty and do something tangible for the Coalition.”
trans-unit.target: “Straight to business, eh? I like it! To cut to the chase, I'm looking to join your crew. It's been a long time since I've seen some real action, and your crew's endeavors have made me itch to get back out there, to really get my hands dirty and do something tangible for the Coalition.”

trans-unit.source: “We'd be honored to have you with us, sir!”
trans-unit.target: “We'd be honored to have you with us, sir!”

trans-unit.source: “Fantastic! I'll meet you on board.”
trans-unit.target: “Fantastic! I'll meet you on board.”

trans-unit.source: “We need to think about this a bit.”
trans-unit.target: “We need to think about this a bit.”

trans-unit.source: “Uh, I did not intend this to be a request. But out of respect for you and your crew, I won't insist. I'm sure we'll run into each other again—let me know if you've made up your mind then.”
trans-unit.target: “Uh, I did not intend this to be a request. But out of respect for you and your crew, I won't insist. I'm sure we'll run into each other again—let me know if you've made up your mind then.”

trans-unit.source: “We'd be thrilled to have you join us, sir.”
trans-unit.target: “We'd be thrilled to have you join us, sir.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm afraid we don't have room for more crew, but I'll let you know if that changes!”
trans-unit.target: “I'm afraid we don't have room for more crew, but I'll let you know if that changes!”

trans-unit.source: “Hello again. So, have you considered my proposition?”
trans-unit.target: “Hello again. So, have you considered my proposition?”

trans-unit.source: You notice an old lady with a familiar-looking face. Aunt Doris! Her food kiosk franchise might leave something to be desired, but her cooking shows have always been excellent.\n\nTo your surprise, she approaches you. “Well hello there! I heard you and your troop were in the neighborhood, so I came here in hopes of running into you.”
trans-unit.target: You notice an old lady with a familiar-looking face. Aunt Doris! Her food kiosk franchise might leave something to be desired, but her cooking shows have always been excellent.\n\nTo your surprise, she approaches you. “Well hello there! I heard you and your troop were in the neighborhood, so I came here in hopes of running into you.”

trans-unit.source: “It's nice to meet you, ma'am! What can we do for you?”
trans-unit.target: “It's nice to meet you, ma'am! What can we do for you?”

trans-unit.source: “This may be a bit silly, but I suppose no harm in asking! You see, I've been having a…how should I put this…late-life crisis as of late. As I'm sure you know, I've been hosting cooking shows, running my restaurants and whatnot for almost four decades now. Hearing stories of your crew's wild adventures, all the things you've done to help make our little moon something better, I just can't help feeling curious about what life as a submariner would've been like.”
trans-unit.target: “This may be a bit silly, but I suppose no harm in asking! You see, I've been having a…how should I put this…late-life crisis as of late. As I'm sure you know, I've been hosting cooking shows, running my restaurants and whatnot for almost four decades now. Hearing stories of your crew's wild adventures, all the things you've done to help make our little moon something better, I just can't help feeling curious about what life as a submariner would've been like.”

trans-unit.source: “It's not a life for everyone.”
trans-unit.target: “It's not a life for everyone.”

trans-unit.source: “Yes, I bet! But it sure is something I'd love to take a shot at. And you know, I'm not as soft as I may look—as a young girl, back in my activist days, I bashed in more filthy separatist heads than you'd believe. And I loved every second of it! I also know a thing or two about medicine, and there isn't an animal on Europa I don't know how to slice.\n\nSo, how about it, would you give this old-timer a chance in your crew? I'd love nothing more than to do my part in our fight for a better Europa!”
trans-unit.target: “Yes, I bet! But it sure is something I'd love to take a shot at. And you know, I'm not as soft as I may look—as a young girl, back in my activist days, I bashed in more filthy separatist heads than you'd believe. And I loved every second of it! I also know a thing or two about medicine, and there isn't an animal on Europa I don't know how to slice.\n\nSo, how about it, would you give this old-timer a chance in your crew? I'd love nothing more than to do my part in our fight for a better Europa!”

trans-unit.source: “How could I say no! Welcome on board, ma'am!”
trans-unit.target: “How could I say no! Welcome on board, ma'am!”

trans-unit.source: “Oh, splendid! I'll just grab a few things and meet you on board!”
trans-unit.target: “Oh, splendid! I'll just grab a few things and meet you on board!”

trans-unit.source: “I understand. Take all the time you need, dear!”
trans-unit.target: “I understand. Take all the time you need, dear!”

trans-unit.source: “Oh, hello again! Have you thought about letting me join you folks?”
trans-unit.target: “Oh, hello again! Have you thought about letting me join you folks?”

trans-unit.source: A familiar-looking man walks up to you. “Hey, it's you! I was actually hoping I'd run into you again.”
trans-unit.target: A familiar-looking man walks up to you. “Hey, it's you! I was actually hoping I'd run into you again.”

trans-unit.source: “Pleasure to meet you again as well, Mr. Subra!”
trans-unit.target: “Pleasure to meet you again as well, Mr. Subra!”

trans-unit.source: “How about we set the courtesies aside and cut to the chase. It's not every day we come across a submarine crew as open-minded as yours, much less one this competent. So I've got a proposition for you that'd take this collaboration between you and the Church even further. And, well, if I'm quite honest, this'd also be a gracious gift for me personally.”
trans-unit.target: “How about we set the courtesies aside and cut to the chase. It's not every day we come across a submarine crew as open-minded as yours, much less one this competent. So I've got a proposition for you that'd take this collaboration between you and the Church even further. And, well, if I'm quite honest, this'd also be a gracious gift for me personally.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm listening.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm listening.”

trans-unit.source: “To put it simply, I've been itching to join your crew for some time now, even before that ordeal with the bounty hunters. The work you've been doing for the Church has been phenomenal, and if I were to join forces with you, I believe together we could drown this world in the grace of our lord. And again, if I'm completely honest, I've been dying to get a taste of life in the untamed waters outside the outposts. So, what say you?”
trans-unit.target: “To put it simply, I've been itching to join your crew for some time now, even before that ordeal with the bounty hunters. The work you've been doing for the Church has been phenomenal, and if I were to join forces with you, I believe together we could drown this world in the grace of our lord. And again, if I'm completely honest, I've been dying to get a taste of life in the untamed waters outside the outposts. So, what say you?”

trans-unit.source: “How could I say no! Welcome to our crew, brother!”
trans-unit.target: “How could I say no! Welcome to our crew, brother!”

trans-unit.source: “Fantastic! I'll meet you on board.”
trans-unit.target: “Fantastic! I'll meet you on board.”

trans-unit.source: “We need to think about this a bit.”
trans-unit.target: “We need to think about this a bit.”

trans-unit.source: “Absolutely, take all the time you need.”
trans-unit.target: “Absolutely, take all the time you need.”

trans-unit.source: “We'd be thrilled to have you.”
trans-unit.target: “We'd be thrilled to have you.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm afraid we don't have room for more crew, but I'll let you know if that changes!”
trans-unit.target: “I'm afraid we don't have room for more crew, but I'll let you know if that changes!”

trans-unit.source: “A pleasure to meet you again, brother. So, have you thought about my proposition? Would you have room for one more crewmate?”
trans-unit.target: “A pleasure to meet you again, brother. So, have you thought about my proposition? Would you have room for one more crewmate?”

trans-unit.source: “Looking for work? We've got some…let's say, research materials that are sorely needed in the neighboring outpost. Get them there, don't ask questions, and we'll pay you.”
trans-unit.target: “Looking for work? We've got some…let's say, research materials that are sorely needed in the neighboring outpost. Get them there, don't ask questions, and we'll pay you.”

trans-unit.source: “Looking for work? The Coalition's hired some fresh meat from our outpost and assigned them a job at a nearby outpost. Escort them over there safely and you'll be paid.”
trans-unit.target: “Looking for work? The Coalition's hired some fresh meat from our outpost and assigned them a job at a nearby outpost. Escort them over there safely and you'll be paid.”

trans-unit.source: “We've got a group of Jovian activists looking for transportation to a nearby outpost. It's better I don't tell you all the details, but they're on an important mission, and if you're looking to do something for a good cause, we'll be sure to pay you for your troubles if you can escort them over there safely.”
trans-unit.target: “We've got a group of Jovian activists looking for transportation to a nearby outpost. It's better I don't tell you all the details, but they're on an important mission, and if you're looking to do something for a good cause, we'll be sure to pay you for your troubles if you can escort them over there safely.”

trans-unit.source: “If you're looking to make yourself known among the Coalition higher-ups, I've got a nice opportunity for you… A high-ranking Coalition official and their armed escort came to visit our outpost, and are now looking for transportation to a nearby outpost. Get them over there safely, and there's some marks in it for you as well.”
trans-unit.target: “If you're looking to make yourself known among the Coalition higher-ups, I've got a nice opportunity for you… A high-ranking Coalition official and their armed escort came to visit our outpost, and are now looking for transportation to a nearby outpost. Get them over there safely, and there's some marks in it for you as well.”

trans-unit.source: “If you're interested in contributing to our fight against the Coalition fascists, we've got a job for you… A certain activist who is very important to our cause is looking for transportation to a nearby outpost along with their armed escort. Get them over there safely, and we'll be sure to make it worth your while.”
trans-unit.target: “If you're interested in contributing to our fight against the Coalition fascists, we've got a job for you… A certain activist who is very important to our cause is looking for transportation to a nearby outpost along with their armed escort. Get them over there safely, and we'll be sure to make it worth your while.”

trans-unit.source: “We recently captured some Separatists and are looking for someone to transport them to a nearby outpost. If it was up to me, I'd throw them out the airlock, but the Coalition higher-ups apparently want them for interrogation. You'll be paid well for their transportation, but be aware that they need to be closely guarded.”
trans-unit.target: “We recently captured some Separatists and are looking for someone to transport them to a nearby outpost. If it was up to me, I'd throw them out the airlock, but the Coalition higher-ups apparently want them for interrogation. You'll be paid well for their transportation, but be aware that they need to be closely guarded.”

trans-unit.source: “We had a little trouble with a Coalition attack sub recently, and long story short, we've now got their surviving crew locked up in our brig. After some negotiation, we've agreed to get them transferred to the next outpost over. If you're willing to get them there, there's some marks in it for you, but be aware that they need to be closely guarded.”
trans-unit.target: “We had a little trouble with a Coalition attack sub recently, and long story short, we've now got their surviving crew locked up in our brig. After some negotiation, we've agreed to get them transferred to the next outpost over. If you're willing to get them there, there's some marks in it for you, but be aware that they need to be closely guarded.”

trans-unit.source: “We believe that Separatist terrorists have snuck among the innocent civilians looking to leave on the next transport ship. If you're willing to have your ship act as that transport, you might be able to draw the terrorists out into the open and detain them. Just make sure the civilians survive.”
trans-unit.target: “We believe that Separatist terrorists have snuck among the innocent civilians looking to leave on the next transport ship. If you're willing to have your ship act as that transport, you might be able to draw the terrorists out into the open and detain them. Just make sure the civilians survive.”

trans-unit.source: “According to our sources, the Coalition has sent some undercover operatives to investigate Separatist activity around this area. We have reason to believe that some of them may be trying to get out of here disguised as innocent civilians on the next transport ship. If you're willing to have your ship act as that transport, you might be able to draw the operatives out into the open and detain them. Just make sure the civilians survive.”
trans-unit.target: “According to our sources, the Coalition has sent some undercover operatives to investigate Separatist activity around this area. We have reason to believe that some of them may be trying to get out of here disguised as innocent civilians on the next transport ship. If you're willing to have your ship act as that transport, you might be able to draw the operatives out into the open and detain them. Just make sure the civilians survive.”

trans-unit.source: “A Coalition vessel has been patrolling the waters around our outpost for a while, seizing inbound cargo shipments and harassing our ships. We've so far avoided escalating the situation further, but supplies are starting to run low. If you'd be willing to help us and take down that vessel, it would be a great favor to our outpost and to the Separatist cause. And we'd be more than happy to pay you for it, of course.”
trans-unit.target: “A Coalition vessel has been patrolling the waters around our outpost for a while, seizing inbound cargo shipments and harassing our ships. We've so far avoided escalating the situation further, but supplies are starting to run low. If you'd be willing to help us and take down that vessel, it would be a great favor to our outpost and to the Separatist cause. And we'd be more than happy to pay you for it, of course.”

trans-unit.source: A stern-looking woman walks up to you. For a second you wonder why she looks so familiar, until you realize you've seen this face in the news a bunch of times.\n\nShe reaches out to shake your hand. “Hello. I've been waiting to meet you. Victoria Petran, the First Lieutenant of the Jovian Separatists.”
trans-unit.target: A stern-looking woman walks up to you. For a second you wonder why she looks so familiar, until you realize you've seen this face in the news a bunch of times.\n\nShe reaches out to shake your hand. “Hello. I've been waiting to meet you. Victoria Petran, the First Lieutenant of the Jovian Separatists.”

trans-unit.source: “It's an honor to meet you. How can I be of service?”
trans-unit.target: “It's an honor to meet you. How can I be of service?”

trans-unit.source: “Actually, I'm not here to ask for your service, in fact quite the opposite. I've been following you and your crew's endeavors for a while now, and your work for our cause has been astounding. If we had more people like you in our ranks, the Coalition would've already been wiped off the face of Europa.”
trans-unit.target: “Actually, I'm not here to ask for your service, in fact quite the opposite. I've been following you and your crew's endeavors for a while now, and your work for our cause has been astounding. If we had more people like you in our ranks, the Coalition would've already been wiped off the face of Europa.”

trans-unit.source: “Thank you. We're doing our best.”
trans-unit.target: “Thank you. We're doing our best.”

trans-unit.source: “In fact, I believe the work you've been doing has been so exceptional, that I've come to think I could make a bigger difference as a part of your crew than behind my desk in my office. And I believe I could be of value to you as well; I've seen a fair share of submarine life and know a thing or two about weapons and medicine. So, how's that sound—would you have an opening for another security officer?”
trans-unit.target: “In fact, I believe the work you've been doing has been so exceptional, that I've come to think I could make a bigger difference as a part of your crew than behind my desk in my office. And I believe I could be of value to you as well; I've seen a fair share of submarine life and know a thing or two about weapons and medicine. So, how's that sound—would you have an opening for another security officer?”

trans-unit.source: “How could I say no! Welcome on board, ma'am!”
trans-unit.target: “How could I say no! Welcome on board, ma'am!”

trans-unit.source: “Great! In that case, you can cut it with the ma'ams—I'm a part of your crew now, not your superior. Can't wait to embark on our first mission!”
trans-unit.target: “Great! In that case, you can cut it with the ma'ams—I'm a part of your crew now, not your superior. Can't wait to embark on our first mission!”

trans-unit.source: “I'm honored, but we need to think about this a bit.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm honored, but we need to think about this a bit.”

trans-unit.source: “I understand. Well, if you decide to take me on board in the future, I'm sure we'll run into each other again in one of the Separatist-controlled outposts.”
trans-unit.target: “I understand. Well, if you decide to take me on board in the future, I'm sure we'll run into each other again in one of the Separatist-controlled outposts.”

trans-unit.source: “Yes, we do have room for an extra security officer. Welcome on board, ma'am!”
trans-unit.target: “Yes, we do have room for an extra security officer. Welcome on board, ma'am!”

trans-unit.source: “I'm afraid we don't have room for more crew, but I'll let you know if that changes!”
trans-unit.target: “I'm afraid we don't have room for more crew, but I'll let you know if that changes!”

trans-unit.source: “Hello again. Have you thought about my proposal? Would you be interested in taking me on board?”
trans-unit.target: “Hello again. Have you thought about my proposal? Would you be interested in taking me on board?”

trans-unit.source: Someone who looks like they'd just crawled out from a diesel generator's exhaust pipe walks up to you.\n\n“Oi, I've been looking for you.”
trans-unit.target: Someone who looks like they'd just crawled out from a diesel generator's exhaust pipe walks up to you.\n\n“Oi, I've been looking for you.”

trans-unit.source: “You look familiar. Have we met?”
trans-unit.target: “You look familiar. Have we met?”

trans-unit.source: “It was your crew who got me out of that Coalition holding cell, wasn't it? Didn't have time for introductions then, but they call me Sootman. Let's go with that. Say, you don't happen to need an extra crewmate?”
trans-unit.target: “It was your crew who got me out of that Coalition holding cell, wasn't it? Didn't have time for introductions then, but they call me Sootman. Let's go with that. Say, you don't happen to need an extra crewmate?”

trans-unit.source: “Sootman? As in that masked Separatist the Coalition has been trying to track down for ages? Are you shitting me?”
trans-unit.target: “Sootman? As in that masked Separatist the Coalition has been trying to track down for ages? Are you shitting me?”

trans-unit.source: “Aye, that's me. The word around the outposts is that you folks have been putting up a real good fight against the Coalition, and I want in on that. So, how about it?”
trans-unit.target: “Aye, that's me. The word around the outposts is that you folks have been putting up a real good fight against the Coalition, and I want in on that. So, how about it?”

trans-unit.source: “Absolutely! We'd be honored to have someone of your caliber join us.”
trans-unit.target: “Absolutely! We'd be honored to have someone of your caliber join us.”

trans-unit.source: “Nice. See you on board.”
trans-unit.target: “Nice. See you on board.”

trans-unit.source: “We need to think about this a bit.”
trans-unit.target: “We need to think about this a bit.”

trans-unit.source: “Aight.”
trans-unit.target: “Aight.”

trans-unit.source: “So? You got a place for me on board?”
trans-unit.target: “So? You got a place for me on board?”

trans-unit.source: “I'll have to congratulate you. Not many make it through the Plateau, much less while being so useful. I'll radio ahead to let you move to the Great Sea.”
trans-unit.target: “I'll have to congratulate you. Not many make it through the Plateau, much less while being so useful. I'll radio ahead to let you move to the Great Sea.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm sure it will. That is not an official guarantee by the Jovian Separatists nor an endorsement. I'll let the guard know you can take care of yourself.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm sure it will. That is not an official guarantee by the Jovian Separatists nor an endorsement. I'll let the guard know you can take care of yourself.”

trans-unit.source: “As you may be aware, this outpost is the last stop before the Europan Ridge. We don't let every sub pass through here, but if there's any truth to the rumors we've been hearing about your crew, you've been a valuable ally in our fight against the Coalition, so you're more than welcome to pass.”
trans-unit.target: “As you may be aware, this outpost is the last stop before the Europan Ridge. We don't let every sub pass through here, but if there's any truth to the rumors we've been hearing about your crew, you've been a valuable ally in our fight against the Coalition, so you're more than welcome to pass.”

trans-unit.source: “Looking to pass through the outpost to the deeper regions? I'm sorry, but you'd better find another route. I don't know who you are or who you're working for, and for all I know you could be another Coalition pawn heading to harass our people down in the Europan Ridge. Of course, if you happened to have some marks to share with me, perhaps you could convince me of your good intentions…”
trans-unit.target: “Looking to pass through the outpost to the deeper regions? I'm sorry, but you'd better find another route. I don't know who you are or who you're working for, and for all I know you could be another Coalition pawn heading to harass our people down in the Europan Ridge. Of course, if you happened to have some marks to share with me, perhaps you could convince me of your good intentions…”

trans-unit.source: “On second thought, you seem all right. Perhaps I'll let you pass after all. Pleasure doing business with you.”
trans-unit.target: “On second thought, you seem all right. Perhaps I'll let you pass after all. Pleasure doing business with you.”

trans-unit.source: “Not enough cash? Well, tough luck. Maybe you should play in the kiddie pool a little longer to prove us you're not standing in the enemy's ranks.”
trans-unit.target: “Not enough cash? Well, tough luck. Maybe you should play in the kiddie pool a little longer to prove us you're not standing in the enemy's ranks.”

trans-unit.source: “Your choice. Maybe it's better for you to play in the kiddie pool a little longer and figure out whose flag is worth carrying.”
trans-unit.target: “Your choice. Maybe it's better for you to play in the kiddie pool a little longer and figure out whose flag is worth carrying.”

trans-unit.source: “It says here you've been a great asset in our fight against the Coalition here in the Ridge. For that, we've decided to grant you access to the Aphotic Plateau. Bon voyage!”
trans-unit.target: “It says here you've been a great asset in our fight against the Coalition here in the Ridge. For that, we've decided to grant you access to the Aphotic Plateau. Bon voyage!”

trans-unit.source: “So you want to enter the Hydrothermal Wastes? Why on Europa would you do such a thing? I suppose it's none of my business. A friend of the Separatists is a friend of mine. Go ahead.”
trans-unit.target: “So you want to enter the Hydrothermal Wastes? Why on Europa would you do such a thing? I suppose it's none of my business. A friend of the Separatists is a friend of mine. Go ahead.”

trans-unit.source: Faction
trans-unit.target: Faction

trans-unit.source:
Man is a bridge stretched between the animal and the quintessential form—a bridge over the Abyss.

A dangerous crossing, a dangerous wayfaring, a dangerous looking-back, a dangerous trembling and halting.

What is great in man is that he is a bridge and not a goal: what is lovable in man is that he is an over-going and a down-going. Few are the ones who make it past the bridge, but truly are they of great virtue:

They know not how to live except as down-goers, for they are the over-goers.

They do not first seek a reason beyond the stars for going down and being sacrifices, but sacrificeth themselves to the world, that the world of the quintessential form may hereafter arrive.

They liveth in order to know, and seeketh to know in order that the quintessential form may hereafter live. Thus seeketh they their own down-going.

They laboureth and inventeth, that they may build the house for the quintessential form, and prepare for it the ocean, animal, plant and their very body: for thus seeketh they their own down-going.

They chasten their God, because they loveth their God: for they must succumb through the wrath of their God.

Their soul is deep even in the wounding, and may succumb through a small matter: thus goeth they willingly over the bridge.

They are an open spirit and an open heart: thus is their head only the bowels of their heart; their heart, however, causeth their down-going.

Lo, I am become a herald of the tide, and a strong stream amidst the water: the tide is the quintessential form.
trans-unit.target:

Lo, I am become a herald of the tide, and a strong stream amidst the water: the tide is the quintessential form.

trans-unit.source: The Jovian Separatists are offering [reward] marks in exchange for delivering a shipment of high explosives to a group of operatives in [location2].

trans-unit.source: The Coalition has sent some undercover operatives to investigate Separatist activity in [location2]. They are in urgent need of weapons and ammunition—deliver them and you will receive a reward of [reward] marks.
trans-unit.target: The Coalition has sent some undercover operatives to investigate Separatist activity in [location2]. They are in urgent need of weapons and ammunition—deliver them and you will receive a reward of [reward] marks.

trans-unit.source: The Coalition has hired a number of commoners from [location1] and needs them to be transported to [location2]. Take care not to endanger their lives, as you will only be paid your reward of [reward] marks if none of them die.
trans-unit.target: The Coalition has hired a number of commoners from [location1] and needs them to be transported to [location2]. Take care not to endanger their lives, as you will only be paid your reward of [reward] marks if none of them die.

trans-unit.source: A group of clowns has offered to pay [reward] marks for transportation to [location2]. You have been warned that they may be somewhat unruly, or at the very least not accustomed to being on board a submarine.
trans-unit.target: A group of clowns has offered to pay [reward] marks for transportation to [location2]. You have been warned that they may be somewhat unruly, or at the very least not accustomed to being on board a submarine.

trans-unit.source: The Church of Husk has offered a reward of [reward] marks for transporting a group of acolytes to [location2]. There is reason to believe some of them might be planning a premature "communion" of their own, and a subsequent escape into the cold sea, but the Church has asked you to keep an eye on them and bring them to [location2] in human form.
trans-unit.target: The Church of Husk has offered a reward of [reward] marks for transporting a group of acolytes to [location2]. There is reason to believe some of them might be planning a premature "communion" of their own, and a subsequent escape into the cold sea, but the Church has asked you to keep an eye on them and bring them to [location2] in human form.

trans-unit.source: A group of Jovian Separatists need to be transported to [location2]. They are on an important mission and all of them need to make it to the destination unharmed—you will only be paid your reward of [reward] marks if none of them die.
trans-unit.target: A group of Jovian Separatists need to be transported to [location2]. They are on an important mission and all of them need to make it to the destination unharmed—you will only be paid your reward of [reward] marks if none of them die.

trans-unit.source: A highly valuable Coalition official and their armed escort must be transported to [location2]. Take care not to pose any unnecessary risk to the VIP, as you will only be paid a reward of [reward] marks if they survive.
trans-unit.target: A highly valuable Coalition official and their armed escort must be transported to [location2]. Take care not to pose any unnecessary risk to the VIP, as you will only be paid a reward of [reward] marks if they survive.

trans-unit.target: A group of captured Separatists need to be transported to [location2] for a reward of [reward] marks. Make sure these prisoners are well-guarded during your voyage, as they may try to escape. Do not let any of them die.

trans-unit.source:
I. The honk that can be told is not the eternal Honk. The honkmother that can be named is not the eternal Honkmother. The nameless is what sets the stage. The named is the play, the actors, the audience and the wall between them. Freed from seriousness, you can see the hidden mystery. Serious eyes only see what is visibly real.

II. We shape a balloon into an animal, but it is the emptiness inside that lets the balloon take its shape. We work with the substantial, but what is between the lines is what we use.

III. The highest Fun is not to seek to create Fun, but to allow yourself to become it. The serious person seeks to do Fun things, and finds that they cannot do them continually. The serious person tries to squeeze all the Fun out of the lemons they’ve been given, only to find the juice is sour.
trans-unit.target:

The named is the play, the actors, the audience and the wall between them. Freed from seriousness, you can see the hidden mystery. Serious eyes only see what is visibly real.

II. We shape a balloon into an animal, but it is the emptiness inside that lets the balloon take its shape. We work with the substantial, but what is between the lines is what we use.

III. The highest Fun is not to seek to create Fun, but to allow yourself to become it. The serious person seeks to do Fun things, and finds that they cannot do them continually. The serious person tries to squeeze all the Fun out of the lemons they’ve been given, only to find the juice is sour.

trans-unit.source:
IV. When a Jester hears of the Grand Joke of the Universe, he lets it be his guide. When an average person hears of the Grand Joke of the Universe, he believes half of it, and doubts the other half. When a foolish person hears of the Grand Joke of the Universe, he laughs out loud at the very idea. If he didn't laugh, it would not be a joke, would it?

V. The best Jesters are those the people hardly know exist. The next best is a Jester who is loved and praised. Next comes the one who is feared. The worst one is the Jester that is despised. When a great Jester has accomplished their task, the people say, "this was so much fun," oblivious of what’s upstream of the Stream of Fun, much like they are oblivious of the Grandest of Jesters, the Uppest of Upstreams, the Blankest of Slates.

VI. As is the Blankest of Slates, so is the mind of the Jester. They see the mind of the people as their own mind. To those who are good they treat as good. To those who aren't good they also treat as good. They trust people who are trustworthy. They also trust people who aren't trustworthy. Thus they attain goodness and trust, lest the manure-minded serious people stop the stream of Fun.
trans-unit.target:

To those who aren't good they also treat as good. They trust people who are trustworthy. They also trust people who aren't trustworthy. Thus they attain goodness and trust, lest the manure-minded serious people stop the stream of Fun.

trans-unit.source:
VII. If you do not fear death, how can it intimidate you? To truly understand this is to take a great stride along the Path of the Bike Horn. To unnaturally try to extend life is to fear death. To try and alter the life-breath is to fear death. The Jester understands that when something reaches its prime it will soon begin to decline. Changing the natural is to stray from the Path of the Bike Horn. Those who do it will not have Fun in the end.

VIII. With compassion, you will be able to be brave. With moderation, you will be able to bring Fun to the world. With humility, you will be able to guide others. To abandon compassion while seeking to be brave, or abandoning moderation while being amusing, or abandoning humility while seeking to guide will not lead to Fun.

IX. The kite rises high and the Jester lets it soar; the kite string pops and the Jester lets it fly away. He has but does not possess, acts but does not expect. When his work is done, he forgets it. That is why it lasts forever, much like the Grandest of Jesters. Praise the Honkmother!
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.source:
Three metamorphoses of the spirit do I designate to you: how the spirit becometh a chalice in the shape of a man’s fortitude, the chalice emptieth of the stale wine, and the chalice refilleth with fresh wine.

Many things are there for the spirit to carry, the strong spirit in which the reverence dwelleth.

What is there to carry? so asketh the spirit, holding out its hands. What is the heaviest thing? asketh the spirit, that I may take it upon me and rejoice in my strength.

Is it not this: To descend to the deepest depths to tempt the temper?

Or is it this: To feed on the fruit of knowledge, and for the sake of truth to suffer hunger of soul?

Or is it this: To go into foul water when it is the water of truth, and not disclaim the pests and parasites within it?

Or is it this: To love those who despise us, and to give one's hand to the phantom when it is going to frighten us?

All these heaviest things the spirit taketh upon itself: and as a chalice in the shape of a man’s fortitude, it rejoiceth in its strength.

But then riseth a miasma from the chalice, for the man’s fortitude carrieth burdens of old, now stale and foul.

Thus speaketh the miasma to the spirit, "Thou shalt!"

The ideas and values of thousands of years in the air reeketh. "All the values of things embalming me. All values have already been created, and all created values—do I represent. Verily, there shall be no 'I will' any more." Thus speaketh the miasma.

My brethren, wherefore is there need of emptying the chalice? Why sufficeth not the fortitude of man, which renounceth and is reverent? To create new values—that, a mere man cannot accomplish: but to create itself freedom for new creating—that can the fortitude of man do.

To create itself freedom, and give a holy Nay even unto duty and humanity: for that, my brethren, there is no need of the man. To assume the ride into new values—that is the most formidable assumption for a reverent spirit.

But tell me, my brethren, what is the value of an empty chalice? For is it not the wine that gives it purpose? Thus must we find a new wine, fresh and untainted, beyond the fortitude of man, yet within its grasp.

Aye, for the game of creating, my brethren, there is needed a holy Yea unto life, the fortitude of life itself. A fortitude readily within the grasp of those who dare to reach out, as if a Gift the world has handed us.

Thus comes the third and final metamorphosis, the Ascension: the man’s spirit filled with new life, the fortitude of man and the fortitude of the world as one. Its own will, willeth now the spirit; his own world winneth the world's outcast. Thus is the quintessential form.
trans-unit.target:
